8687269Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Close()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Attempt to avoid exception by doing initial state checkDi2015NewLine    if (this.channel.State == CommunicationState.Opened)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Now we must do a (potentially) remote call;Di2015NewLine            // this could always throw.Di2015NewLine            this.channel.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (CommunicationException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (TimeoutException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If Close failed, we might need to do final cleanup here.Di2015NewLine    if (this.channel.State == CommunicationState.Faulted)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // local cleanup -- never throws (aside from catastrophic situations)Di2015NewLine        this.channel.Abort();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8689571Di2015UniqueSeparatortimer += (float)gameTime.ElapsedGameTime.TotalSeconds; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// if the timer is passed timerLength, we just draw the whole string Di2015NewLineif (timer >= timerLength) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine   spriteBatch.DrawString(myFont, myString, stringPosition, stringColor); Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// otherwise we want to just draw a substring Di2015NewLineelse Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine   // figure out how many characters to show based on Di2015NewLine   // the ratio of the timer to the timerLength Di2015NewLine   int numCharsToShow = (int)(myString.Length * (timer / timerLength)); Di2015NewLine   string strToDraw = myString.Substring(0, numCharsToShow);    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // now just draw the substring instead Di2015NewLine   spriteBatch.DrawString(myFont, strToDraw, stringPosition, stringColor); Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8692471Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    interface A { }Di2015NewLine    interface B :A { void b(); } // B inherits from ADi2015NewLine    interface C :A { void c(); } // C also inherits from ADi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      // declare varsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      A a = null;Di2015NewLine      B b = null;Di2015NewLine      C c = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // a can happily hold references for B.Di2015NewLine      a = b;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // To call B's methods you need to cast it to B.Di2015NewLine      ((B)a).b();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // a can happily hold references for C.Di2015NewLine      a = c;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // To call C's methods you need to cast it to C.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      a = c;Di2015NewLine      ((C)a).c(); Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8692471Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    private interface A { }Di2015NewLine    private interface B : A { string b();}Di2015NewLine    private interface C : A { string c();}Di2015NewLine    class BClass : B { public string b() { return "B"; } }Di2015NewLine    class CClass : C { public string c() { return "C"; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      A a = null;Di2015NewLine      B b = new BClass();Di2015NewLine      C c = new CClass();Di2015NewLine      a = b;Di2015NewLine      ((B)a).b();Di2015NewLine      a = c;Di2015NewLine      ((C)a).c();Di2015NewLine    }    Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

8698260Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string GetQuarter(DateTime date)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   // we just need to check the month irrespective of the other parts(year, day)Di2015NewLine   // so we will have all the dates with year part commonDi2015NewLine   DateTime dummyDate = new DateTime(1900, date.Month, date.Day);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   if (dummyDate < new DateTime(1900, 7, 1) && dummyDate >= new DateTime(1900, 4, 1))Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      return "Q1";Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   else if (dummyDate < new DateTime(1900, 10, 1) && dummyDate >= new DateTime(1900, 7, 1))Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       return "Q2";Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   else if (dummyDate < new DateTime(1900, 1, 1) && dummyDate >= new DateTime(1900, 10, 1))Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       return "Q3";Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   elseDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       return "Q4";Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8698345Di2015UniqueSeparator  public static int GetQuarter(DateTime date)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (date.Month >= 4 && date.Month <= 6)Di2015NewLine            return 1;Di2015NewLine        else if (date.Month >= 7 && date.Month <= 9)Di2015NewLine            return 2;Di2015NewLine        else if (date.Month >= 10 && date.Month <= 12)Di2015NewLine            return 3;Di2015NewLine        else Di2015NewLine            return 4;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8698471Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// This class extends the the DataGridView so row numbers will Di2015NewLine    /// automatically appear in the row header cells. In this Di2015NewLine    /// implementation, the width of the column that contains the row Di2015NewLine    /// header cells is automatically adjusted to accomodate the row Di2015NewLine    /// numbering.Di2015NewLine    /// ******************************************************************Di2015NewLine    ///  AUTHOR: Daniel S. SoperDi2015NewLine    ///     URL: http://www.danielsoper.comDi2015NewLine    ///    DATE: 20 February 2007Di2015NewLine    /// LICENSE: Public Domain. Enjoy!   :-)Di2015NewLine    /// ******************************************************************Di2015NewLine    /// Di2015NewLine    class MyDGV : DataGridViewDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public MyDGV()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //perform any necessary customization initialization hereDi2015NewLine        } //end default constructorDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override void OnRowPostPaint(DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        { //this method overrides the DataGridView's RowPostPaint event Di2015NewLine          //in order to automatically draw numbers on the row header cellsDi2015NewLine          //and to automatically adjust the width of the column containingDi2015NewLine          //the row header cells so that it can accommodate the new rowDi2015NewLine          //numbers,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //store a string representation of the row number in 'strRowNumber'Di2015NewLine            string strRowNumber = (e.RowIndex + 1).ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //prepend leading zeros to the string if necessary to improveDi2015NewLine            //appearance. For example, if there are ten rows in the grid,Di2015NewLine            //row seven will be numbered as "07" instead of "7". Similarly, if Di2015NewLine            //there are 100 rows in the grid, row seven will be numbered as "007".Di2015NewLine            while (strRowNumber.Length < this.RowCount.ToString().Length) strRowNumber = "0" + strRowNumber;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //determine the display size of the row number string usingDi2015NewLine            //the DataGridView's current font.Di2015NewLine            SizeF size = e.Graphics.MeasureString(strRowNumber, this.Font);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //adjust the width of the column that contains the row header cells Di2015NewLine            //if necessaryDi2015NewLine            if (this.RowHeadersWidth < (int)(size.Width + 20)) this.RowHeadersWidth = (int)(size.Width + 20);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //this brush will be used to draw the row number string on theDi2015NewLine            //row header cell using the system's current ControlText colorDi2015NewLine            Brush b = SystemBrushes.ControlText;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //draw the row number string on the current row header cell usingDi2015NewLine            //the brush defined above and the DataGridView's default fontDi2015NewLine            e.Graphics.DrawString(strRowNumber, this.Font, b, e.RowBounds.Location.X + 15, e.RowBounds.Location.Y + ((e.RowBounds.Height - size.Height) / 2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //call the base object's OnRowPostPaint methodDi2015NewLine            base.OnRowPostPaint(e);Di2015NewLine        } //end OnRowPostPaint methodDi2015NewLine    } //end classDi2015NewLine

8699639Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class AlphanumComparator<T> : IComparer<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private enum ChunkType { Alphanumeric, Numeric };Di2015NewLine        private bool InChunk(char ch, char otherCh)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ChunkType type = ChunkType.Alphanumeric;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (char.IsDigit(otherCh))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                type = ChunkType.Numeric;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if ((type == ChunkType.Alphanumeric && char.IsDigit(ch))Di2015NewLine                || (type == ChunkType.Numeric && !char.IsDigit(ch)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int Compare(T x, T y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            String s1 = x as string;Di2015NewLine            String s2 = y as string;Di2015NewLine            if (s1 == null || s2 == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int thisMarker = 0, thisNumericChunk = 0;Di2015NewLine            int thatMarker = 0, thatNumericChunk = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while ((thisMarker < s1.Length) || (thatMarker < s2.Length))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (thisMarker >= s1.Length)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return -1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (thatMarker >= s2.Length)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return 1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                char thisCh = s1[thisMarker];Di2015NewLine                char thatCh = s2[thatMarker];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                StringBuilder thisChunk = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine                StringBuilder thatChunk = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                while ((thisMarker < s1.Length) && (thisChunk.Length == 0 || InChunk(thisCh, thisChunk[0])))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    thisChunk.Append(thisCh);Di2015NewLine                    thisMarker++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (thisMarker < s1.Length)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        thisCh = s1[thisMarker];Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                while ((thatMarker < s2.Length) && (thatChunk.Length == 0 || InChunk(thatCh, thatChunk[0])))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    thatChunk.Append(thatCh);Di2015NewLine                    thatMarker++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (thatMarker < s2.Length)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        thatCh = s2[thatMarker];Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int result = 0;Di2015NewLine                // If both chunks contain numeric characters, sort them numericallyDi2015NewLine                if (char.IsDigit(thisChunk[0]) && char.IsDigit(thatChunk[0]))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    thisNumericChunk = Convert.ToInt32(thisChunk.ToString());Di2015NewLine                    thatNumericChunk = Convert.ToInt32(thatChunk.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (thisNumericChunk < thatNumericChunk)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        result = -1;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (thisNumericChunk > thatNumericChunk)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        result = 1;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    result = thisChunk.ToString().CompareTo(thatChunk.ToString());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (result != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return result;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8700371Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Bitmap CropRotatedRect(Bitmap source, Rectangle rect, float angle, bool HighQuality)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Bitmap result = new Bitmap(rect.Width, rect.Height);Di2015NewLine    using (Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(result))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        g.InterpolationMode = HighQuality ? 8701386Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string GetTimeElpased(int secondsElpased, int minutesElpased, int hoursElpased,Di2015NewLine    int daysElpased, int monthsElpased, int yearsElpased)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (secondsElpased < 30)Di2015NewLine        return "few seconds ago";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (minutesElpased < 1)Di2015NewLine        return secondsElpased + " seconds ago";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (minutesElpased < 5)Di2015NewLine        return "few minutes ago";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (hoursElpased < 1)Di2015NewLine        return minutesElpased + " minutes ago";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (hoursElpased < 5)Di2015NewLine        return "few hours ago";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (daysElpased < 1)Di2015NewLine        return hoursElpased + " hours ago";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (daysElpased == 1)Di2015NewLine        return "yesterday";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (monthsElpased < 1)Di2015NewLine    return daysElpased + " days ago";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (monthsElpased == 1)Di2015NewLine        return "month ago";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (yearsElpased < 1)Di2015NewLine        return monthsElpased + " months ago";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string halfYear = (monthsElpased >= 6) ? " and half" : "";Di2015NewLine    if (yearsElpased == 1)Di2015NewLine        return "year" + halfYear + " ago";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return yearsElpased + " years ago";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8704572Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static List<Type> GetTypes(Type t)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<Type> list = new List<Type>();Di2015NewLine        if (t.IsPrimitive)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!list.Contains(t))Di2015NewLine                list.Add(t);Di2015NewLine            return list;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (!t.Assembly.Equals(System.Reflection.Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly()))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //if the type is defined in another assembly then we will check itsDi2015NewLine            //generic parameters. This handles the List<Item> case.Di2015NewLine            var genArgs = t.GetGenericArguments();Di2015NewLine            if (genArgs != null)Di2015NewLine                foreach (Type genericArgumentType in genArgs)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if(!list.Contains(genericArgumentType))Di2015NewLine                        list.AddRange(GetTypes(genericArgumentType));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            return list;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //get types of props and gen argsDi2015NewLine            var types = t.GetProperties(System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Public | System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic | System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance).Select(pi => pi.PropertyType).ToList();Di2015NewLine            types.AddRange(t.GetGenericArguments());Di2015NewLine            foreach (System.Type innerType in types)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //get the object represented by the property to traverse the types in it.Di2015NewLine                if (!list.Contains(innerType))Di2015NewLine                    list.Add(innerType);Di2015NewLine                else continue; //because the type has been already added and as thus its child types also has been already added.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var innerInnerTypes = GetTypes(innerType);Di2015NewLine                //add the types filtering duplicatesDi2015NewLine                foreach (Type t1 in innerInnerTypes) //list.AddRange(innerTypes); //without filtering duplicates.Di2015NewLine                    if (!list.Contains(t1))Di2015NewLine                        list.Add(t1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return list;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
8704572Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetTypes(typeof(List<Item>))Di2015NewLineCount = 3Di2015NewLine    [0]: {Name = "Item" FullName = "AssemblyNameXYZ.Item"}Di2015NewLine    [1]: {Name = "String" FullName = "System.String"}Di2015NewLine    [2]: {Name = "Int32" FullName = "System.Int32"}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineGetTypes(typeof(Item))Di2015NewLineCount = 2Di2015NewLine    [0]: {Name = "String" FullName = "System.String"}Di2015NewLine    [1]: {Name = "Int32" FullName = "System.Int32"}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineReflection.GetTypes(typeof(RootClass))Di2015NewLineCount = 5Di2015NewLine    [0]: {Name = "List`1" FullName = "System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[AssemblyNameXYZ.Item, AssemblyNameXYZ, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]]"}Di2015NewLine    [1]: {Name = "Item" FullName = "AssemblyNameXYZ.Item"}Di2015NewLine    [2]: {Name = "String" FullName = "System.String"}Di2015NewLine    [3]: {Name = "Int32" FullName = "System.Int32"}Di2015NewLine    [4]: {Name = "SubClass" FullName = "AssemblyNameXYZ.SubClass"}Di2015NewLine

   if (hwnd != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int hwndChild = 0;Di2015NewLine            cb = new EnumChildCallback(EnumChildProc);Di2015NewLine            EnumChildWindows(hwnd, cb, {Di2015NewLine                    // If we successfully got a native OMDi2015NewLine                    // IDispatch pointer, we can QI this forDi2015NewLine                    // an Excel Application (using the implicitDi2015NewLine                    // cast operator supplied in the PIA).Di2015NewLine                    _Application = ptr.Application;Di2015NewLine                    _Workbook = 8708957Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.Drawing.Bitmap
8708957Di2015UniqueSeparatorBitmap.Lockbits()
8708957Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void LockUnlockBitsExample(PaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a new bitmap.Di2015NewLine        Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap("c:\\\\fakePhoto.jpg");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Lock the bitmap's bits.  Di2015NewLine        Rectangle rect = new Rectangle(0, 0, bmp.Width, bmp.Height);Di2015NewLine        System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData bmpData =Di2015NewLine            bmp.LockBits(rect, System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageLockMode.ReadWrite,Di2015NewLine            bmp.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the address of the first line.Di2015NewLine        IntPtr ptr = bmpData.Scan0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Declare an array to hold the bytes of the bitmap.Di2015NewLine        int bytes  = Math.Abs(bmpData.Stride) * bmp.Height;Di2015NewLine        byte[] rgbValues = new byte[bytes];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Copy the RGB values into the array.Di2015NewLine        System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy(ptr, rgbValues, 0, bytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set every third value to 255. A 24bpp bitmap will look red.  Di2015NewLine        for (int counter = 2; counter < rgbValues.Length; counter += 3)Di2015NewLine            rgbValues[counter] = 255;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Copy the RGB values back to the bitmapDi2015NewLine        System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy(rgbValues, 0, ptr, bytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Unlock the bits.Di2015NewLine        bmp.UnlockBits(bmpData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Draw the modified image.Di2015NewLine        e.Graphics.DrawImage(bmp, 0, 150);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8721340Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Stream DownloadFile(string remotePath)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // initialize FTP client...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    BlockingStream blockingStream = new BlockingStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Assign self-removing TransferComplete handler.Di2015NewLine    EventHandler<TransferCompleteEventArgs> transferCompleteDelegate = null;Di2015NewLine    transferCompleteDelegate = delegate(object sender, TransferCompleteEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Indicate to waiting readers that 'end of stream' is reached.Di2015NewLine        blockingStream.SetEndOfStream();Di2015NewLine        ftp.TransferComplete -= transferCompleteDelegate;Di2015NewLine        // Next line may or may not be necessary and/or safe.  Please test thoroughly.Di2015NewLine        blockingStream.Close();Di2015NewLine        // Also close the ftp client here, if it is a local variable.Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    ftp.TransferComplete += transferCompleteDelegate;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Returns immediately.  Download is still in progress.Di2015NewLine    ftp.GetFileAsync(remotePath, blockingStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return blockingStream;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8726175Di2015UniqueSeparator        internal void ConvertFile(string inputFileName, Guid taskID)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string tmpName = string.Format(Di2015NewLine            "{0}\\\\{1}.flv",Di2015NewLine            Path.GetTempPath(), inputFileName.Substring(inputFileName.LastIndexOf("\\\\")+1));Di2015NewLine        ProcessStartInfo psi = new ProcessStartInfo();Di2015NewLine        psi.FileName = this._processorExecutable;Di2015NewLine        psi.Arguments = string.Format(@"-i ""{0}"" -y ""{1}""", inputFileName, tmpName);Di2015NewLine        psi.CreateNoWindow = true;Di2015NewLine        psi.ErrorDialog = false;Di2015NewLine        psi.UseShellExecute = false;Di2015NewLine        psi.WindowStyle = ProcessWindowStyle.Hidden;Di2015NewLine        psi.RedirectStandardOutput = true;Di2015NewLine        psi.RedirectStandardInput = false;Di2015NewLine        psi.RedirectStandardError = true;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Start the process with the info we specified.Di2015NewLine            // Call WaitForExit and then the using statement will close.Di2015NewLine            using (Process exeProcess = Process.Start(psi))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                exeProcess.PriorityClass = ProcessPriorityClass.High;Di2015NewLine                string outString = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine                // use ansynchronous reading for at least one of the streamsDi2015NewLine                // to avoid deadlockDi2015NewLine                exeProcess.OutputDataReceived += (s, e) => {Di2015NewLine                    outString += e.Data;Di2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine                exeProcess.BeginOutputReadLine();Di2015NewLine                // now read the StandardError stream to the endDi2015NewLine                // this will cause our main thread to wait for theDi2015NewLine                // stream to close (which is when ffmpeg quits)Di2015NewLine                string errString = exeProcess.StandardError.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine                Trace.WriteLine(outString);Di2015NewLine                Trace.TraceError(errString);Di2015NewLine                byte[] fileBytes = File.ReadAllBytes(tmpName);Di2015NewLine                if (fileBytes.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this._sSystem.SaveOutputFile(Di2015NewLine                        fileBytes, Di2015NewLine                        tmpName.Substring(tmpName.LastIndexOf("\\\\")+1),Di2015NewLine                        taskIDDi2015NewLine                        );Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Trace.TraceError(e.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8732540Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void DrawModel( Model myModel, float modelRotation, Vector3 modelPosition,Di2015NewLine                       Vector3 cameraPositionDi2015NewLine     ) {Di2015NewLine    // Copy any parent transforms.Di2015NewLine    Matrix[] transforms = new Matrix[myModel.Bones.Count];Di2015NewLine    myModel.CopyAbsoluteBoneTransformsTo(transforms);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Draw the model. A model can have multiple meshes, so loop.Di2015NewLine    foreach (ModelMesh mesh in myModel.Meshes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This is where the mesh orientation is set, as well Di2015NewLine        // as our camera and projection.Di2015NewLine        foreach (BasicEffect effect in mesh.Effects)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            effect.EnableDefaultLighting();Di2015NewLine            effect.World = transforms[mesh.ParentBone.Index] * Di2015NewLine                            Matrix.CreateRotationY(modelRotation) *Di2015NewLine                            Matrix.CreateTranslation(modelPosition);Di2015NewLine            effect.View = Matrix.CreateLookAt(cameraPosition,Di2015NewLine                            Vector3.Zero, Vector3.Up);Di2015NewLine            effect.Projection = Matrix.CreatePerspectiveFieldOfView(Di2015NewLine                                    MathHelper.ToRadians(45.0f), 1.333f, Di2015NewLine                                    1.0f, 10000.0f);Di2015NewLine            effect.LightingEnabled = true; // turn on the lighting subsystem.Di2015NewLine            effect.DirectionalLight0.DiffuseColor = new Vector3(0.5f, 0, 0); // a red lightDi2015NewLine            effect.DirectionalLight0.Direction = new Vector3(1, 0, 0);  // coming along the x-axisDi2015NewLine            effect.DirectionalLight0.SpecularColor = new Vector3(0, 1, 0); // with green highlightsDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Draw the mesh, using the effects set above.Di2015NewLine        mesh.Draw();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8735366Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass InvokeFromMeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public event EventHandler RaiseMe;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var fromMe = new InvokeFromMe();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        fromMe.RaiseMe += fromMe_RaiseMe;Di2015NewLine        fromMe.RaiseMe += fromMe_RaiseMe1;Di2015NewLine        fromMe.RaiseMe += fromMe_RaiseMe2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        FireEvent(fromMe, "RaiseMe", null, EventArgs.Empty);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void fromMe_RaiseMe(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Event Handler 0 Raised");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static void fromMe_RaiseMe1(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Event Handler 1 Raised");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static void fromMe_RaiseMe2(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Event Handler 2 Raised");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void FireEvent(object onMe, string invokeMe, params object[] eventParams)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MulticastDelegate eventDelagate =Di2015NewLine              (MulticastDelegate)onMe.GetType().GetField(invokeMe,Di2015NewLine               System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance |Di2015NewLine               System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic).GetValue(onMe);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Delegate[] delegates = eventDelagate.GetInvocationList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Delegate dlg in delegates)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dlg.Method.Invoke(dlg.Target, eventParams);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8735366Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.Timer.Timer
8735366Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void FirePublicEvent(object onMe, string invokeMe, params object[] eventParams)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MulticastDelegate eventDelagate =Di2015NewLine          (MulticastDelegate)onMe.GetType().GetField(invokeMe,Di2015NewLine           System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance |Di2015NewLine           System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Public).GetValue(onMe);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Delegate[] delegates = eventDelagate.GetInvocationList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (Delegate dlg in delegates)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       dlg.Method.Invoke(dlg.Target, eventParams);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

8739055Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar httpRequest = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefunction getXMLHttpRequest() {Di2015NewLine    if (window.ActiveXObject) {Di2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            return new ActiveXObject("Msxml2.XMLHTTP");Di2015NewLine        } catch (e) {Di2015NewLine            try {Di2015NewLine                return new ActiveXObject("Microsoft.XMLHTTP");Di2015NewLine            } catch (e1) {Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } else if (window.XMLHttpRequest) {Di2015NewLine        return new XMLHttpRequest();Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefunction sendRequest(url, params, callback, method) {Di2015NewLine    httpRequest = getXMLHttpRequest();Di2015NewLine    var httpMethod = method ? method : 'GET';Di2015NewLine    if (httpMethod != 'GET' && httpMethod != 'POST') {Di2015NewLine        httpMethod = 'GET';Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    var httpParams = (params == null || params == '') ? null : params;Di2015NewLine    var httpUrl = url;Di2015NewLine    if (httpMethod == 'GET' && httpParams != null) {Di2015NewLine        httpUrl = httpUrl + "?" + httpParams;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    httpRequest.open(httpMethod, httpUrl, true);Di2015NewLine    httpRequest.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded');Di2015NewLine    httpRequest.onreadystatechange = callback;Di2015NewLine    httpRequest.send(httpMethod == 'POST' ? httpParams : null);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8756355Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string FormatCode(string code)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    switch (code.Length.ToString())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case "8":Di2015NewLine            string codeFormat = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings["Consumer_Code_Format_For_Code_Length_Eight"];Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case "9":Di2015NewLine            codeFormat = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings["Consumer_Code_Format_For_Code_Length_Nine"];Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case "10":Di2015NewLine            codeFormat = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings["Consumer_Code_Format_For_Code_Length_Ten"];Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case "11":Di2015NewLine            codeFormat = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings["Consumer_Code_Format_For_Code_Length_Eleven"];Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case "12":Di2015NewLine            codeFormat = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings["Consumer_Code_Format_For_Code_Length_Twelve"];Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            codeFormat = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings["Consumer_Code_Format_For_Code_Length_Eight"];Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    char[] result = new char[codeformat.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int used = 0;Di2015NewLine    for(i = 0; i < codeformat.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (codeformat[i] == '#')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result[i] = code[used];Di2015NewLine            used++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            result[i] = codeformat[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Finally return the newly formatted codeDi2015NewLine    return new string(result);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8759648Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic T MinBy<T, C>(this IEnumerable<T> sequence, Func<T, C> keySelector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool first = true;Di2015NewLine    T result = default(T);Di2015NewLine    C minKey = default(C);Di2015NewLine    IComparer<C> comparer = Comparer<C>.Default; //or you can pass this in as a parameterDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var item in sequence)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (first)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = item;Di2015NewLine            minKey = keySelector.Invoke(item);Di2015NewLine            first = false;Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        C key = keySelector.Invoke(item);Di2015NewLine        if (comparer.Compare(key, minKey) < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = item;Di2015NewLine            minKey = key;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8759650Di2015UniqueSeparatorDictionary
8759698Di2015UniqueSeparator* It's COM.Di2015NewLine* It's equipped by a MMC 2.0 (COM) console.Di2015NewLine* Its storage can be an XML file or ADAM (Active Directory Application Mode - e un LDAP).Di2015NewLine* It's role-based.Di2015NewLine* It supports static/dynamic applicative groups, members/not-members.Di2015NewLine* Structure based on Roles -> Tasks -> Operations. (Hierarchical Roles and Tasks , none Operations).Di2015NewLine* Authorizations can be added only to Roles.Di2015NewLine* It doesn't implement the "delegate" concept.Di2015NewLine* It doesn't manage authorizations "in the time".Di2015NewLine* It doesn't trigger events.Di2015NewLine* The only type of authorization is "Allow".Di2015NewLine  (to "deny" it needs to remove the user/group from his Role).Di2015NewLine* It supports Scripting / Biz rules.Di2015NewLine* It supports Active Directory users/groups and ADAM users.Di2015NewLine
8759698Di2015UniqueSeparator* It's .NET 2.0.Di2015NewLine* It's equipped by a MMC 3.0 (.NET) console.Di2015NewLine* Its storage is a Sql Server database(2000/MSDE/2005/Express).Di2015NewLine* It's based on Tdo - Typed Data Object technology.Di2015NewLine* It's Item-based.Di2015NewLine* Structure based on Roles -> Tasks -> Operations. (all hierarchical ones).Di2015NewLine* Authorizations can be added to Roles, Task and Operations.Di2015NewLine* It supports static/dynamic applicative groups, members/not-members.Di2015NewLine* LDAP query testing directly from console.Di2015NewLine* It's time-dependant.Di2015NewLine* It's delegate-compliant.Di2015NewLine* It triggers events (ENS).Di2015NewLine* It supports 4 authorization types:Di2015NewLine      o Allow with delegation (authorized and authorized to delegate).Di2015NewLine      o Allow (authorized).Di2015NewLine      o Deny (not authorized).Di2015NewLine      o Neutral (neutral permission, it depends on higher level Item permission).Di2015NewLine* Hierarchical authorizations.Di2015NewLine* It supports Scripting / Biz rules (compiled in .NET - C# - VB - and not interpreted)Di2015NewLine* It supports Active Directory users/groups and custom users defined in SQL Server Database.Di2015NewLine
8759698Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Principal;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineusing AZROLESLib;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace TreyResearch {Di2015NewLine    public class AzManHelper : IDisposable {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        AzAuthorizationStore store;Di2015NewLine        IAzApplication app;Di2015NewLine        string appName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public AzManHelper(string connectionString, string appName) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this.appName = appName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            try {Di2015NewLine                // load and initialize the AzMan runtimeDi2015NewLine                store = new AzAuthorizationStore();Di2015NewLine                store.Initialize(0, connectionString, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // drill down to our applicationDi2015NewLine                app = store.OpenApplication(appName, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (COMException x) {Di2015NewLine                throw new AzManException("Failed to initizlize AzManHelper", x);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (System.IO.FileNotFoundException x) {Di2015NewLine                throw new AzManException(string.Format("Failed to load AzMan policy from {0} - make sure your connection string is correct.", connectionString), x);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Dispose() {Di2015NewLine            if (null == app) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Marshal.ReleaseComObject(app);Di2015NewLine            Marshal.ReleaseComObject(store);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            app = null;Di2015NewLine            store = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool AccessCheck(string audit, Operations op,Di2015NewLine                                WindowsIdentity clientIdentity) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            try {Di2015NewLine                // first step is to create an AzMan context for the clientDi2015NewLine                // this looks at the security identifiers (SIDs) in the user'sDi2015NewLine                // access token and maps them onto AzMan roles, tasks, and operationsDi2015NewLine                IAzClientContext ctx = app.InitializeClientContextFromToken(Di2015NewLine                    (ulong)clientIdentity.Token.ToInt64(), null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // next step is to see if this user is authorized forDi2015NewLine                // the requested operation. Note that AccessCheck allowsDi2015NewLine                // you to check multiple operations at once if you desireDi2015NewLine                object[] scopes = { "" };Di2015NewLine                object[] operations = { (int)op };Di2015NewLine                object[] results = (object[])ctx.AccessCheck(audit, scopes, operations,Di2015NewLine                                                             null, null, null, null, null);Di2015NewLine                int result = (int)results[0];Di2015NewLine                return 0 == result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (COMException x) {Di2015NewLine                throw new AzManException("AccessCheck failed", x);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool AccessCheckWithArg(string audit, Operations op,Di2015NewLine                                       WindowsIdentity clientIdentity,Di2015NewLine                                       string argName, object argValue) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            try {Di2015NewLine                // first step is to create an AzMan context for the clientDi2015NewLine                // this looks at the security identifiers (SIDs) in the user'sDi2015NewLine                // access token and maps them onto AzMan roles, tasks, and operationsDi2015NewLine                IAzClientContext ctx = app.InitializeClientContextFromToken(Di2015NewLine                    (ulong)clientIdentity.Token.ToInt64(), null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // next step is to see if this user is authorized forDi2015NewLine                // the requested operation. Note that AccessCheck allowsDi2015NewLine                // you to check multiple operations at once if you desireDi2015NewLine                object[] scopes = { "" };Di2015NewLine                object[] operations = { (int)op };Di2015NewLine                object[] argNames = { argName };Di2015NewLine                object[] argValues = { argValue };Di2015NewLine                object[] results = (object[])ctx.AccessCheck(audit, scopes, operations,Di2015NewLine                                                             argNames, argValues,Di2015NewLine                                                             null, null, null);Di2015NewLine                int result = (int)results[0];Di2015NewLine                return 0 == result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (COMException x) {Di2015NewLine                throw new AzManException("AccessCheckWithArg failed", x);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // use this to update a running appDi2015NewLine        // after you change the AzMan policyDi2015NewLine        public void UpdateCache() {Di2015NewLine            try {Di2015NewLine                store.UpdateCache(null);Di2015NewLine                Marshal.ReleaseComObject(app);Di2015NewLine                app = store.OpenApplication(appName, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (COMException x) {Di2015NewLine                throw new AzManException("UpdateCache failed", x);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class AzManException : Exception {Di2015NewLine        public AzManException(string message, Exception innerException)Di2015NewLine          : base(message, innerException)Di2015NewLine        {}Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8759698Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Create a Full Storage through .NET codeDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLineprivate void CreateFullStorage()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // USER MUST BE A MEMBER OF SQL DATABASE ROLE: NetSqlAzMan_AdministratorsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Sql Storage connection stringDi2015NewLine    string sqlConnectionString = "data source=(local);initial catalog=NetSqlAzManStorage;user id=netsqlazmanuser;password=password";Di2015NewLine    //Create an instance of SqlAzManStorage classDi2015NewLine    IAzManStorage storage = new SqlAzManStorage(sqlConnectionString);Di2015NewLine    //Open Storage ConnectionDi2015NewLine    storage.OpenConnection();Di2015NewLine    //Begin a new TransactionDi2015NewLine    storage.BeginTransaction(AzManIsolationLevel.ReadUncommitted);Di2015NewLine    //Create a new StoreDi2015NewLine    IAzManStore newStore = storage.CreateStore("My Store", "Store description");Di2015NewLine    //Create a new Basic StoreGroupDi2015NewLine    IAzManStoreGroup newStoreGroup = newStore.CreateStoreGroup(SqlAzManSID.NewSqlAzManSid(), "My Store Group", "Store Group Description", String.Empty, GroupType.Basic);Di2015NewLine    //Retrieve current user SIDDi2015NewLine    IAzManSid mySid = new SqlAzManSID(WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent().User);Di2015NewLine    //Add myself as sid of "My Store Group"Di2015NewLine    IAzManStoreGroupMember storeGroupMember = newStoreGroup.CreateStoreGroupMember(mySid, WhereDefined.Local, true);Di2015NewLine    //Create a new ApplicationDi2015NewLine    IAzManApplication newApp = newStore.CreateApplication("New Application", "Application description");Di2015NewLine    //Create a new RoleDi2015NewLine    IAzManItem newRole = newApp.CreateItem("New Role", "Role description", ItemType.Role);Di2015NewLine    //Create a new TaskDi2015NewLine    IAzManItem newTask = newApp.CreateItem("New Task", "Task description", ItemType.Task);Di2015NewLine    //Create a new OperationDi2015NewLine    IAzManItem newOp = newApp.CreateItem("New Operation", "Operation description", ItemType.Operation);Di2015NewLine    //Add "New Operation" as a sid of "New Task"Di2015NewLine    newTask.AddMember(newOp);Di2015NewLine    //Add "New Task" as a sid of "New Role"Di2015NewLine    newRole.AddMember(newTask);Di2015NewLine    //Create an authorization for myself on "New Role"Di2015NewLine    IAzManAuthorization auth = newRole.CreateAuthorization(mySid, WhereDefined.Local, mySid, WhereDefined.Local, AuthorizationType.AllowWithDelegation, null, null);Di2015NewLine    //Create a custom attributeDi2015NewLine    IAzManAttribute<IAzManAuthorization> attr = auth.CreateAttribute("New Key", "New Value");Di2015NewLine    //Create an authorization for DB User "Andrea" on "New Role"Di2015NewLine    IAzManAuthorization auth2 = newRole.CreateAuthorization(mySid, WhereDefined.Local, storage.GetDBUser("Andrea").CustomSid, WhereDefined.Local, AuthorizationType.AllowWithDelegation, null, null);Di2015NewLine    //Commit transactionDi2015NewLine    storage.CommitTransaction();Di2015NewLine    //Close connectionDi2015NewLine    storage.CloseConnection();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8760014Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> FindSandwichedItem<T>(this IEnumerable<T> items, Predicate<T> matchFilling)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (items == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("items");Di2015NewLine    if (matchFilling == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("matchFilling");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return FindSandwichedItemImpl(items, matchFilling);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static IEnumerable<T> FindSandwichedItemImpl<T>(IEnumerable<T> items, Predicate<T> matchFilling)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using(var iter = items.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T previous = default(T);Di2015NewLine        while(iter.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(matchFilling(iter.Current))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return previous;Di2015NewLine                yield return iter.Current;Di2015NewLine                if (iter.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                    yield return iter.Current;Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    yield return default(T);Di2015NewLine                yield break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            previous = iter.Current;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // If we get here nothing has been found so return three default valuesDi2015NewLine    yield return default(T); // PreviousDi2015NewLine    yield return default(T); // CurrentDi2015NewLine    yield return default(T); // NextDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

TheDi2015NewLine    /// data is returned as a byte array. An IOException isDi2015NewLine    /// thrown if any of the underlying IO calls fail.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="stream">The stream to read data from</param>Di2015NewLine    public static byte[] ReadFully (Stream stream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[32768];Di2015NewLine        using (MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int read = stream.Read (buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                if (read <= 0)Di2015NewLine                    return ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine                ms.Write (buffer, 0, read);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineinterface IclsSODi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    void myVoid();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8762515Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void RunMethods(Type type)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach( var item in lstMethodList.SelectedItems )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach( var method in type.GetMethods() )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if( String.Equals( item.ToString(), method.Name))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                MethodInfo capturedMethod = method;Di2015NewLine                var t = new Thread( () => ThreadMain( type, capturedMethod ) );Di2015NewLine                t.Start();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void ThreadMain( Type type, MethodInfo mi )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    object o = Activator.CreateInstance( type );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    object[] parameters = new object[] { };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    mi.Invoke( o, parameters );Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8763116Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate double ParseDoubleFromString(string num)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //removes multiple spces between characters, cammas, and leading/trailing whitespaceDi2015NewLine    num = Regex.Replace(num.Replace(",", ""), @"\\s+", " ").Trim();Di2015NewLine    double d = 0;Di2015NewLine    int whole = 0;Di2015NewLine    double numerator;Di2015NewLine    double denominator;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //is there a fraction?Di2015NewLine    if (num.Contains("/"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //is there a space?Di2015NewLine        if (num.Contains(" "))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //seperate the integer and fractionDi2015NewLine            int firstspace = num.IndexOf(" ");Di2015NewLine            string fraction = num.Substring(firstspace, num.Length - firstspace);Di2015NewLine            //set the integerDi2015NewLine            whole = int.Parse(num.Substring(0, firstspace));Di2015NewLine            //set the numerator and denominatorDi2015NewLine            numerator = double.Parse(fraction.Split("/".ToCharArray())[0]);Di2015NewLine            denominator = double.Parse(fraction.Split("/".ToCharArray())[1]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //set the numerator and denominatorDi2015NewLine            numerator = double.Parse(num.Split("/".ToCharArray())[0]);Di2015NewLine            denominator = double.Parse(num.Split("/".ToCharArray())[1]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //is it a valid fraction?Di2015NewLine        if (denominator != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            d = whole + (numerator / denominator);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //parse the whole thingDi2015NewLine        d = double.Parse(num.Replace(" ", ""));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return d;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8763264Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass MyLayoutPanel : TableLayoutPanel {Di2015NewLine    protected override bool ProcessCmdKey(ref Message msg, Keys keyData) {Di2015NewLine        var ctl = this.FindForm().ActiveControl;Di2015NewLine        if (ctl.Parent == this) {Di2015NewLine            int col = this.GetColumn(ctl);Di2015NewLine            int row = this.GetRow(ctl);Di2015NewLine            if (keyData == Keys.Left && col > 0) {Di2015NewLine                var newctl = this.GetControlFromPosition(col - 1, row);Di2015NewLine                if (newctl != null) newctl.Focus();Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // etc..Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return base.ProcessCmdKey(ref msg, keyData);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

set; }Di2015NewLine        private Control target { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public IgnoreMouseClickMessageFilter(Control parent, Control target)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.parent = parent;Di2015NewLine            this.target = target;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool PreFilterMessage(ref Message messageBeforeFiltering)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            const Boolean FilterTheMessageOut = true;Di2015NewLine            const Boolean LetTheMessageThrough = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (IsNull(parent)) return LetTheMessageThrough;Di2015NewLine            if (IsNull(target)) return LetTheMessageThrough;Di2015NewLine            if (WasNotClickedOnTarget(parent, target)) return LetTheMessageThrough;Di2015NewLine            if (MessageContainsAnyMousebutton(messageBeforeFiltering)) return FilterTheMessageOut;Di2015NewLine            return LetTheMessageThrough;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private bool MessageContainsAnyMousebutton(Message message)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (message.Msg == 0x202) return true; /* WM_LBUTTONUP*/Di2015NewLine            if (message.Msg == 0x203) return true; /* WM_LBUTTONDBLCLK*/Di2015NewLine            if (message.Msg == 0x204) return true; /* WM_RBUTTONDOWN */Di2015NewLine            if (message.Msg == 0x205) return true; /* WM_RBUTTONUP */Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private bool WasNotClickedOnTarget(Control parent, Control target)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Control clickedOn = parent.GetChildAtPoint(Cursor.Position);Di2015NewLine            if (IsNull(clickedOn)) return true;Di2015NewLine            if (AreEqual(clickedOn, target)) return false;Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private bool AreEqual(Control controlA, Control controlB)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (controlA == controlB) return true;Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private bool IsNull(Control control)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (control == null) return true;Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8777091Di2015UniqueSeparatorParseNew
8777091Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpressionParser
8777091Di2015UniqueSeparator    Expression ParseNew() {Di2015NewLine        NextToken();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool anonymous = true;Di2015NewLine        Type class_type = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (token.id == TokenId.Identifier)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            anonymous = false;Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder full_type_name = new StringBuilder(GetIdentifier());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            NextToken();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (token.id == TokenId.Dot)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                NextToken();Di2015NewLine                ValidateToken(TokenId.Identifier, Res.IdentifierExpected);Di2015NewLine                full_type_name.Append(".");Di2015NewLine                full_type_name.Append(GetIdentifier());Di2015NewLine                NextToken();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            class_type = Type.GetType(full_type_name.ToString(), false);    Di2015NewLine            if (class_type == null)Di2015NewLine                throw ParseError(Res.TypeNotFound, full_type_name.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ValidateToken(TokenId.OpenParen, Res.OpenParenExpected);Di2015NewLine        NextToken();Di2015NewLine        List<DynamicProperty> properties = new List<DynamicProperty>();Di2015NewLine        List<Expression> expressions = new List<Expression>();Di2015NewLine        while (true) {Di2015NewLine            int exprPos = token.pos;Di2015NewLine            Expression expr = ParseExpression();Di2015NewLine            string propName;Di2015NewLine            if (TokenIdentifierIs("as")) {Di2015NewLine                NextToken();Di2015NewLine                propName = GetIdentifier();Di2015NewLine                NextToken();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else {Di2015NewLine                MemberExpression me = expr as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine                if (me == null) throw ParseError(exprPos, Res.MissingAsClause);Di2015NewLine                propName = me.Member.Name;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            expressions.Add(expr);Di2015NewLine            properties.Add(new DynamicProperty(propName, expr.Type));Di2015NewLine            if (token.id != TokenId.Comma) break;Di2015NewLine            NextToken();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        ValidateToken(TokenId.CloseParen, Res.CloseParenOrCommaExpected);Di2015NewLine        NextToken();Di2015NewLine        Type type = anonymous ? DynamicExpression.CreateClass(properties) : class_type; Di2015NewLine        MemberBinding[] bindings = new MemberBinding[properties.Count];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < bindings.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            bindings[i] = Expression.Bind(type.GetProperty(properties[i].Name), expressions[i]);Di2015NewLine        return Expression.MemberInit(Expression.New(type), bindings);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8777156Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var ui = SynchronizationContext.Current;Di2015NewLine    new Thread ( () => Go( ui ) ).Start();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void HandleException( Exception ex )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // this will be run on the UI threadDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void Go( SynchronizationContext ui )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // ...Di2015NewLine        throw null;    // The NullReferenceException will get caught belowDi2015NewLine        // ...Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ui.Send( state => HandleException( ex ), null );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8778826Di2015UniqueSeparator[Serializable()]Di2015NewLinepublic struct CoordsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    readonly public double x, y, z;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Coords(double x, double y, double z)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.x = x;Di2015NewLine        this.y = y;Di2015NewLine        this.z = z;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Coords FromString(string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(value)) return new Coords();Di2015NewLine        double x = 0,y= 0,z = 0;Di2015NewLine        string[] parts = value.Split(',');Di2015NewLine        if (parts.Length > 0) double.TryParse(parts[0], out x);Di2015NewLine        if (parts.Length > 1) double.TryParse(parts[1], out y);Di2015NewLine        if (parts.Length > 2) double.TryParse(parts[2], out z);Di2015NewLine        return new Coords(x, y, z);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Ensure round-trip formattingDi2015NewLine        return string.Format("{0:R},{1:R},{2:R}", x, y, z);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8779464Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing iTextSharp.text;Di2015NewLineusing iTextSharp.text.pdf;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace WindowsFormsApplication1 {Di2015NewLine    public partial class Form1 : Form {Di2015NewLine        public Form1() {Di2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void Form1_Load(object sender, EventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine            string workingFolder = Environment.GetFolderPath(Environment.SpecialFolder.Desktop);Di2015NewLine            string startFile = Path.Combine(workingFolder, "StartFile.pdf");Di2015NewLine            string watermarkedFile = Path.Combine(workingFolder, "Watermarked.pdf");Di2015NewLine            string unwatermarkedFile = Path.Combine(workingFolder, "Un-watermarked.pdf");Di2015NewLine            string watermarkText = "This is a test";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //SECTION 1Di2015NewLine            //Create a 5 page PDF, nothing special hereDi2015NewLine            using (FileStream fs = new FileStream(startFile, FileMode.Create, FileAccess.Write, FileShare.None)) {Di2015NewLine                using (Document doc = new Document(PageSize.LETTER)) {Di2015NewLine                    using (PdfWriter witier = PdfWriter.GetInstance(doc, fs)) {Di2015NewLine                        doc.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        for (int i = 1; i <= 5; i++) {Di2015NewLine                            doc.NewPage();Di2015NewLine                            doc.Add(new Paragraph(String.Format("This is page {0}", i)));Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        doc.Close();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //SECTION 2Di2015NewLine            //Create our watermark on a separate layer. The only different here is that we are adding the watermark to a PdfLayer which is an OCG or Optional Content GroupDi2015NewLine            PdfReader reader1 = new PdfReader(startFile);Di2015NewLine            using (FileStream fs = new FileStream(watermarkedFile, FileMode.Create, FileAccess.Write, FileShare.None)) {Di2015NewLine                using (PdfStamper stamper = new PdfStamper(reader1, fs)) {Di2015NewLine                    int pageCount1 = reader1.NumberOfPages;Di2015NewLine                    //Create a new layerDi2015NewLine                    PdfLayer layer = new PdfLayer("WatermarkLayer", stamper.Writer);Di2015NewLine                    for (int i = 1; i <= pageCount1; i++) {Di2015NewLine                        iTextSharp.text.Rectangle rect = reader1.GetPageSize(i);Di2015NewLine                        //Get the ContentByte objectDi2015NewLine                        PdfContentByte cb = stamper.GetUnderContent(i);Di2015NewLine                        //Tell the CB that the next commands should be "bound" to this new layerDi2015NewLine                        cb.BeginLayer(layer);Di2015NewLine                        cb.SetFontAndSize(BaseFont.CreateFont(BaseFont.HELVETICA, BaseFont.CP1252, BaseFont.NOT_EMBEDDED), 50);Di2015NewLine                        PdfGState gState = new PdfGState();Di2015NewLine                        gState.FillOpacity = 0.25f;Di2015NewLine                        cb.SetGState(gState);Di2015NewLine                        cb.SetColorFill(BaseColor.BLACK);Di2015NewLine                        cb.BeginText();Di2015NewLine                        cb.ShowTextAligned(PdfContentByte.ALIGN_CENTER, watermarkText, rect.Width / 2, rect.Height / 2, 45f);Di2015NewLine                        cb.EndText();Di2015NewLine                        //"Close" the layerDi2015NewLine                        cb.EndLayer();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //SECTION 3Di2015NewLine            //Remove the layer created aboveDi2015NewLine            //First we bind a reader to the watermarked file, then strip out a bunch of things, and finally use a simple stamper to write out the edited readerDi2015NewLine            PdfReader reader2 = new PdfReader(watermarkedFile);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //NOTE, This will destroy all layers in the document, only use if you don't have additional layersDi2015NewLine            //Remove the OCG group completely from the document.Di2015NewLine            //reader2.Catalog.Remove(PdfName.OCPROPERTIES);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Clean up the reader, optionalDi2015NewLine            reader2.RemoveUnusedObjects();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Placeholder variablesDi2015NewLine            PRStream stream;Di2015NewLine            String content;Di2015NewLine            PdfDictionary page;Di2015NewLine            PdfArray contentarray;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Get the page countDi2015NewLine            int pageCount2 = reader2.NumberOfPages;Di2015NewLine            //Loop through each pageDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 1; i <= pageCount2; i++) {Di2015NewLine                //Get the pageDi2015NewLine                page = reader2.GetPageN(i);Di2015NewLine                //Get the raw contentDi2015NewLine                contentarray = page.GetAsArray(PdfName.CONTENTS);Di2015NewLine                if (contentarray != null) {Di2015NewLine                    //Loop through contentDi2015NewLine                    for (int j = 0; j < contentarray.Size; j++) {Di2015NewLine                        //Get the raw byte streamDi2015NewLine                        stream = (PRStream)contentarray.GetAsStream(j);Di2015NewLine                        //Convert to a string. 8786997Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class PriceParser {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private const string MATCH_STRING = @"Current Hourly Price \\(HOEP\\): \\$\\d+\\.\\d\\d/MWh \\((\\d+\\.\\d\\d)/kWh\\)";Di2015NewLine  private const string REPLACE_STRING = @"Current Hourly Price $1 /kWh";Di2015NewLine  private static readonly Regex regex=new Regex(MATCH_STRING,RegexOptions.Compiled);Di2015NewLine  private static readonly Regex entirePageRegex=new Regex(string.Format("^.*{0}.*$",MATCH_STRING),RegexOptions.Compiled|RegexOptions.Singleline);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static void get_HEOP1(string web) {Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(regex.Replace(web,REPLACE_STRING));Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static void get_HEOP2(string web) {Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(entirePageRegex.Replace(web,REPLACE_STRING));Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8787227Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string FindMonthDayOnly(System.Globalization.CultureInfo ci)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  string shortPattern = ci.DateTimeFormat.ShortDatePattern;Di2015NewLine  while(shortPattern[0] != 'd' && shortPattern[0] != 'M')Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    shortPattern = shortPattern.Substring(1);Di2015NewLine    if(shortPattern.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine      return ci.DateTimeFormat.ShortDatePattern;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  while(shortPattern[shortPattern.Length - 1] != 'd' && shortPattern[shortPattern.Length - 1] != 'M')Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    shortPattern = shortPattern.Substring(0, shortPattern.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine    if(shortPattern.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine      return ci.DateTimeFormat.ShortDatePattern;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return shortPattern;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8787308Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE FUNCTION ConvertFromBase  Di2015NewLine(  Di2015NewLine    @value AS VARCHAR(MAX),  Di2015NewLine    @base AS BIGINT  Di2015NewLine) RETURNS BIGINT AS BEGIN  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- just some variables  Di2015NewLineDECLARE @characters CHAR(36),  Di2015NewLine        @result BIGINT,  Di2015NewLine        @index SMALLINT;  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- initialize our charater set, our result, and the index  Di2015NewLineSELECT @characters = '0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz',  Di2015NewLine       @result = 0,  Di2015NewLine       @index = 0;  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- make sure we can make the base conversion.  there can't  Di2015NewLine-- be a base 1, but you could support greater than base 36  Di2015NewLine-- if you add characters to the @charater string  Di2015NewLineIF @base < 2 OR @base > 36 RETURN NULL;  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- while we have characters to convert, convert them and  Di2015NewLine-- prepend them to the result.  we start on the far right  Di2015NewLine-- and move to the left until we run out of digits.  the  Di2015NewLine-- conversion is the standard (base ^ index) * digit  Di2015NewLineWHILE @index < LEN(@value)  Di2015NewLine    SELECT @result = @result + POWER(@base, @index) *   Di2015NewLine                     (CHARINDEX  Di2015NewLine                        (SUBSTRING(@value, LEN(@value) - @index, 1)  Di2015NewLine                        , @characters) - 1  Di2015NewLine                     ),  Di2015NewLine           @index = @index + 1;  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- return the result  Di2015NewLineRETURN @result;  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEND  Di2015NewLine
8787308Di2015UniqueSeparator UPDATE [cp] SET label = dbo.ConvertFromBase(id,16);Di2015NewLine

8787415Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class UploadFileDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public UploadFile()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ContentType = "application/octet-stream";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Filename { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string ContentType { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Stream Stream { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8787415Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic byte[] UploadFiles(string address, IEnumerable<UploadFile> files, NameValueCollection values)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var request = WebRequest.Create(address);Di2015NewLine    request.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine    var boundary = "---------------------------" + DateTime.Now.Ticks.ToString("x", NumberFormatInfo.InvariantInfo);Di2015NewLine    request.ContentType = "multipart/form-data; boundary=" + boundary;Di2015NewLine    boundary = "--" + boundary;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var requestStream = request.GetRequestStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Write the valuesDi2015NewLine        foreach (string name in values.Keys)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var buffer = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(boundary + Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine            requestStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            buffer = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(string.Format("Content-Disposition: form-data; name=\\"{0}\\"{1}{1}", name, Environment.NewLine));Di2015NewLine            requestStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            buffer = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(values[name] + Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine            requestStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Write the filesDi2015NewLine        foreach (var file in files)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var buffer = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(boundary + Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine            requestStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            buffer = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(string.Format("Content-Disposition: form-data; name=\\"{0}\\"; filename=\\"{1}\\"{2}", file.Name, file.Filename, Environment.NewLine));Di2015NewLine            requestStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            buffer = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(string.Format("Content-Type: {0}{1}{1}", file.ContentType, Environment.NewLine));Di2015NewLine            requestStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            file.Stream.CopyTo(requestStream);Di2015NewLine            buffer = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine            requestStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var boundaryBuffer = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(boundary + "--");Di2015NewLine        requestStream.Write(boundaryBuffer, 0, boundaryBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var response = request.GetResponse())Di2015NewLine    using (var responseStream = response.GetResponseStream())Di2015NewLine    using (var stream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        responseStream.CopyTo(stream);Di2015NewLine        return stream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8788704Di2015UniqueSeparator1000000000; 2164 (no lock)Di2015NewLine1000000000; 23258 (lock)Di2015NewLine21.094ns per lockDi2015NewLine
8788704Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class PDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Test(1); // for JITDi2015NewLine        Test(1000000);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static readonly object syncLock = new object();Di2015NewLine    static void Test(int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int j = 0;Di2015NewLine        var watch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        for(int i = 0 ; i < count ; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int z = 0; z < 1000; z++)Di2015NewLine                j++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        long withoutMillis = watch.ElapsedMilliseconds;Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0}; {1} (no lock)", j, watch.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        j = 0;Di2015NewLine        watch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int z = 0; z < 1000; z++ )Di2015NewLine                lock (syncLock)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    j++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        long withMillis = watch.ElapsedMilliseconds;Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0}; {1} (lock)", j, watch.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        long deltaNano = (withMillis - withoutMillis) * 1000000;Di2015NewLine                // nano = 1000 micro = 1000000 milliDi2015NewLine        double perLockNano = deltaNano/(1000.0 * count);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0}ns per lock", perLockNano);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8788945Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Bitmap CropRotatedRect(Bitmap source, Rectangle rect, float angle, bool HighQuality)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int[] offsets = { -1, 1, 0 }; //place 0 last!Di2015NewLine    Bitmap result = new Bitmap(rect.Width, rect.Height);Di2015NewLine    using (Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(result))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        g.InterpolationMode = HighQuality ? InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic : InterpolationMode.Default;Di2015NewLine        foreach (int x in offsets)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (int y in offsets)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (Matrix mat = new Matrix())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //create the appropriate filler offset according to x,yDi2015NewLine                    //resulting in offsets (-1,-1), (-1, 0), (-1,1) ... (0,0)Di2015NewLine                    mat.Translate(-rect.Location.X - rect.Width * x, -rect.Location.Y - rect.Height * y);Di2015NewLine                    mat.RotateAt(angle, rect.Location);Di2015NewLine                    g.Transform = mat;Di2015NewLine                    g.DrawImage(source, new Point(0, 0));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8789196Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring theWord = myString.GetWordAtPosition(18);
8789196Di2015UniqueSeparator    static class WordFinderDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static string GetWordAtPosition(this string text, int position)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (text.Length - 1 < position || text[position] == ' ') return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int start = position;Di2015NewLine            int end = position;Di2015NewLine            while (text[start] != ' ' && start > 0) start--;Di2015NewLine            while (text[end] != ' ' && end < text.Length - 1) end++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return text.Substring(start == 0 ? 0 : start + 1, end - start - 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8792743Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass UpdateTo : IComparable<UpdateTo>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public decimal Version { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Order { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Path { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private const string Prefix = "UpdateTo";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public UpdateTo(string path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /* No error-checking here -- BEWARE!! */Di2015NewLine        Path = path;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string toParse = Path.Substring(Path.IndexOf(Prefix, StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase) + Prefix.Length);Di2015NewLine        var split = toParse.Split('-');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Version = decimal.Parse(split[0]);Di2015NewLine        Order = split.Length == 2 ? int.Parse(split[1]) : int.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int CompareTo(UpdateTo other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int versionCompare = Version.CompareTo(other.Version);Di2015NewLine        return versionCompare == 0 ? Order.CompareTo(other.Order) : versionCompare;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8804628Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static HttpCookie AuthCookie(CurrentIdentity identity) {Di2015NewLine   //Create the Authticket, store it in Cookie and redirect user backDi2015NewLine   FormsAuthenticationTicket authTicket = new FormsAuthenticationTicket(1,Di2015NewLine                      identity.Name, DateTime.Now, DateTime.Now.AddHours(3), true, identity.ToString(), FormsAuthentication.FormsCookiePath);Di2015NewLine   string encryptedTicket = FormsAuthentication.Encrypt(authTicket);Di2015NewLine   HttpCookie authCookie = new HttpCookie(FormsAuthentication.FormsCookieName, encryptedTicket);Di2015NewLine   authCookie.Expires = authTicket.Expiration;Di2015NewLine   return authCookie;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8804628Di2015UniqueSeparatorHttpResponse res = HttpContext.Current.Response;Di2015NewLineres.Cookies.Add(Helper.AuthCookie(identity));Di2015NewLineres.Redirect(FormsAuthentication.GetRedirectUrl(identity.Name, true));Di2015NewLineres.End();Di2015NewLine
8804628Di2015UniqueSeparatorif (Request.IsAuthenticated == true) {Di2015NewLine        // Extract the forms authentication cookieDi2015NewLine        string cookieName = FormsAuthentication.FormsCookieName;Di2015NewLine        HttpCookie authCookie = Context.Request.Cookies[cookieName];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (null == authCookie) {Di2015NewLine            // There is no authentication cookie.Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        FormsAuthenticationTicket authTicket = null;Di2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            authTicket = FormsAuthentication.Decrypt(authCookie.Value);Di2015NewLine        } catch (Exception) {Di2015NewLine            // Log exception details (omitted for simplicity)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (null == authTicket) {Di2015NewLine            // Cookie failed to decrypt.Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // When the ticket was created, the UserData property was assigned aDi2015NewLine        // pipe delimited string of role names.Di2015NewLine        string[] userInfo = authTicket.UserData.Split('|');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create an Identity objectDi2015NewLine        FormsIdentity id = new FormsIdentity(authTicket);Di2015NewLine        //Populate CurrentIdentity, from Serialized stringDi2015NewLine        CurrentIdentity currentIdentity = new CurrentIdentity(userInfo[0], userInfo[1], userInfo[2]);Di2015NewLine        System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal principal = new System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal(currentIdentity, userInfo);Di2015NewLine        Context.User = principal;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8804644Di2015UniqueSeparatorlock
