8808475Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine{    Di2015NewLine    int[] w = new int[100];Di2015NewLine    public Form1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        dataGridView1.AutoSizeColumnsMode = DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.Fill;    Di2015NewLine        Shown += new EventHandler(Form1_Shown);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void Form1_Shown(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        dataGridView1.ColumnWidthChanged += dataGridView1_ColumnWidthChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //to know what WERE the widths.Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < dataGridView1.Columns.Count; i++) w[i] = dataGridView1.Columns[i].Width;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Won't work without this.Di2015NewLine        dataGridView1.AutoSizeColumnsMode = DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.None;Di2015NewLine    }    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void dataGridView1_ColumnWidthChanged(object sender, DataGridViewColumnEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int column = e.Column.Index;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //unsubscribe so changing will not call itself.Di2015NewLine        dataGridView1.ColumnWidthChanged -= dataGridView1_ColumnWidthChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //updating width.Di2015NewLine        dataGridView1.Columns[column + 1].Width = (w[column + 1] + w[column]) - dataGridView1.Columns[column].Width;Di2015NewLine        w[column + 1] = dataGridView1.Columns[column + 1].Width;Di2015NewLine        w[column] = dataGridView1.Columns[column].Width;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //re-subscribeDi2015NewLine        dataGridView1.ColumnWidthChanged += dataGridView1_ColumnWidthChanged;Di2015NewLine    }    Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8808576Di2015UniqueSeparatordelegate
8808576Di2015UniqueSeparator            // This delegate enables asynchronous calls for settingDi2015NewLine    // the text property on a TextBox control.Di2015NewLine    delegate void SetTextCallback(string text);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This method demonstrates a pattern for making thread-safeDi2015NewLine    // calls on a Windows Forms control. Di2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    // If the calling thread is different from the thread thatDi2015NewLine    // created the TextBox control, this method creates aDi2015NewLine    // SetTextCallback and calls itself asynchronously using theDi2015NewLine    // Invoke method.Di2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    // If the calling thread is the same as the thread that createdDi2015NewLine    // the TextBox control, the Text property is set directly. Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void SetText(string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // InvokeRequired required compares the thread ID of theDi2015NewLine        // calling thread to the thread ID of the creating thread.Di2015NewLine        // If these threads are different, it returns true.Di2015NewLine        if (this.textBox1.InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine        {   Di2015NewLine            SetTextCallback d = new SetTextCallback(SetText);Di2015NewLine            this.Invoke(d, new object[] { text });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.textBox1.Text = text;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
8808681Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic string FormatType(Type t)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string result = t.Name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (t.IsGenericType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result = string.Format("{0}<{1}>",Di2015NewLine            result.Split('`')[0],Di2015NewLine            string.Join(",", t.GetGenericArguments().Select(FormatType)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8809483Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IVisitableObject { }Di2015NewLinepublic interface IGenericComponent<T> where T : IVisitableObjectDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    void Update(T msg);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineabstract class DispatcherDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected Dispatcher() { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public abstract void Dispatch(IVisitableObject message, IEnumerable<object> subscribers);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static Dictionary<Type, Dispatcher> dispatchers = new Dictionary<Type, Dispatcher>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static Dispatcher GetDispatcherFor(IVisitableObject message)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type type = message.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!dispatchers.ContainsKey(type))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Type closedType = typeof(Dispatcher<>).MakeGenericType(message.GetType());Di2015NewLine            object dispatcher = Activator.CreateInstance(closedType);Di2015NewLine            dispatchers[type] = (Dispatcher)dispatcher;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return dispatchers[type];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Dispatcher<T> : Dispatcher where T : IVisitableObjectDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override void Dispatch(IVisitableObject message, IEnumerable<object> subscribers)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var msg = (T)message;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var subscriber in subscribers.OfType<IGenericComponent<T>>())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            subscriber.Update(msg);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8809657Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class Dropshadow : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Dropshadow(Form parentForm)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /*This bit of code makes the form click-through. Di2015NewLine          So you can click forms that are below it in z-space */Di2015NewLine        int wl = GetWindowLong(this.Handle, -20);Di2015NewLine        wl = wl | 0x80000 | 0x20;Di2015NewLine        SetWindowLong(this.Handle, -20, wl);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Makes the start location the same as parent.Di2015NewLine        this.StartPosition = parentForm.StartPosition;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        parentForm.Activated += ParentForm_Activated; //Fires on parent activation to do a this.BringToFront() Di2015NewLine        this.Deactivate += This_Deactivated; //Toggles a boolean that ensures that ParentForm_Activated does fire when clicking through (this)Di2015NewLine        parentForm.Closed += ParentForm_Closed; //Closes this when parent closesDi2015NewLine        parentForm.Move += ParentForm_Move; //Follows movement of parent formDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Draws border with standard bitmap modifications and mergingDi2015NewLine        /* Omitted function to avoid extra confusion */Di2015NewLine        Bitmap getShadow = DrawBlurBorder(parentForm.ClientSize.Width, parentForm.ClientSize.Height);Di2015NewLine        /* **This code was featured in the original post:** */Di2015NewLine        SetBitmap(getShadow, 255); //Sets background as 32-bit image with full alpha.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.Location = Offset; //Set within DrawBlurBorder creates an offset Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private void ParentForm_Activated(object o, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /* Sets this form on top when parent form is activated.*/Di2015NewLine        if (isBringingToFront)Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            /*Hopefully prevents recusion*/Di2015NewLine            isBringingToFront = false;Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.BringToFront();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /* Some special tweaks omitted to avoid confusion */Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private void This_Deactivated(object o, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /* Prevents recusion. */Di2015NewLine        isBringingToFront = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    /* Closes this when parent form closes. */Di2015NewLine    private void ParentForm_Closed(object o, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    /* Adjust position when parent moves. */Di2015NewLine    private void ParentForm_Move(object o, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(o is Form)Di2015NewLine            this.Location = new Point((o as Form).Location.X + Offset.X, (o as Form).Location.Y + Offset.Y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

8810048Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class GroupedDictionary<T> : IDictionary<T,IList<T>>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<T, int> _keys;Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<int, IList<T>> _valueGroups;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public GroupedDictionary()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _keys = new Dictionary<T, int>();Di2015NewLine        _valueGroups = new Dictionary<int, IList<T>>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(KeyValuePair<T, IList<T>> item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Add(item.Key, item.Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(T key, IList<T> value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // look if some of the values already existDi2015NewLine        int existingGroupKey = -1;Di2015NewLine        foreach (T v in value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_keys.Keys.Contains(v))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                existingGroupKey = _keys[v];Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (existingGroupKey == -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // new groupDi2015NewLine            int newGroupKey = _valueGroups.Count;Di2015NewLine            _valueGroups.Add(newGroupKey, new List<T>(value));Di2015NewLine            _valueGroups[newGroupKey].Add(key);Di2015NewLine            foreach (T v in value)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _keys.Add(v, newGroupKey);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            _keys.Add(key, newGroupKey);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // existing groupDi2015NewLine            _valueGroups[existingGroupKey].Add(key);Di2015NewLine            // add items that are newDi2015NewLine            foreach (T v in value)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if(!_valueGroups[existingGroupKey].Contains(v))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _valueGroups[existingGroupKey].Add(v);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // add new keysDi2015NewLine            _keys.Add(key, existingGroupKey);Di2015NewLine            foreach (T v in value)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!_keys.Keys.Contains(v))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _keys.Add(v, existingGroupKey);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IList<T> this[T key]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _valueGroups[_keys[key]]; }Di2015NewLine        set { throw new NotImplementedException(); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8810355Di2015UniqueSeparator    ...Di2015NewLine    var publisher = GetPublisher("My App Name");Di2015NewLine    ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string GetPublisher(string application)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var key = Registry.CurrentUser.OpenSubKey(@"Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Uninstall"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var appKey = key.GetSubKeyNames().FirstOrDefault(x => GetValue(key, x, "DisplayName") == application);Di2015NewLine            if (appKey == null) { return null; }Di2015NewLine            return GetValue(key, appKey, "Publisher");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string GetValue(RegistryKey key, string app, string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var subKey = key.OpenSubKey(app))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!subKey.GetValueNames().Contains(value)) { return null; }Di2015NewLine            return subKey.GetValue(value).ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8811020Di2015UniqueSeparatorHttpModule

8811020Di2015UniqueSeparatorWWW-Authenticate
8811020Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class BasicAuthenticationModule: IHttpModuleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public void Init(HttpApplication application)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    application.AuthenticateRequest += new EventHandler(Do_Authentication);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void Do_Authentication(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var request = HttpContext.Current.Request;Di2015NewLine    string header = request.Headers["HTTP_AUTHORIZATION"];Di2015NewLine    if(header != null && header.StartsWith("Basic "))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      // Header is good, let's check username and passwordDi2015NewLine      string username = DecodeFromHeader(header, "username");Di2015NewLine      string password = DecodeFromHeader(header, password);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if(Validate(username, password) Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        // Create a custom IPrincipal object to carry the user's identityDi2015NewLine        HttpContext.Current.User = new BasicPrincipal(username);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      elseDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        Protect();Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Protect();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void Protect()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    response.StatusCode = 401;Di2015NewLine    response.Headers.Add("WWW-Authenticate", "Basic realm=\\"Test\\"");Di2015NewLine    response.Write("You must authenticate");Di2015NewLine    response.End();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void DecodeFromHeader()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // Figure this out based on specDi2015NewLine    // It's basically base 64 decode and split on the :Di2015NewLine    throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private bool Validate(string username, string password)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return (username == "foo" && pasword == "bar");Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public void Dispose() {}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public class BasicPrincipal : IPrincipalDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // Implement simple class to hold the user's identityDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8812006Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic double[] Convert(string parm)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //input shall be: string s = x12y04;Di2015NewLine    //inp s looks like x12y04Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //splut the string on the Y (so this tech should also work for x89232y329)Di2015NewLine    //so this will create res[0] that is x89232 and an res[1] that is 329Di2015NewLine    string[] res = parm.Split(new string[] { "y" }, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLine    //now for the x in res[0], we replace it for a 0 so it are all numbersDi2015NewLine    string resx = res[0].Replace("x", "0");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //now we will get the strings to doubles so we can really start using them.Di2015NewLine    double x = double.Parse(resx);Di2015NewLine    double y = double.Parse(res[1]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //get the values backDi2015NewLine    return new double[] { x, y };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8812640Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected override void OnNavigatedTo(System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    SetPlayerSource();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    base.OnNavigatedTo(e);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void SetPlayerSource()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    XDocument audioPlayer = XDocument.Load("Audio.xml");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var aani = (from audio in audioPlayer.Descendants("Note")Di2015NewLine                where audio.Attribute("id").Value == nameDi2015NewLine                select new AudioClassDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Audio = (string)audio.Element("url").ValueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }).SingleOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    player.Source = new Uri(aani.Audio, UriKind.Relative);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void ButtonKey_Click(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var buttonName = (sender as Button).Name;Di2015NewLine    var underscorePos = buttonName.IndexOf('_');Di2015NewLine    name = buttonName.Substring(0, underscorePos);Di2015NewLine    SetPlayerSource();Di2015NewLine    player.Play();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8813035Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public sealed class PairingDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int Index { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int Length { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int Offset { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Pairing(int index, int length, int offset)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Index = index;Di2015NewLine            Length = length;Di2015NewLine            Offset = offset;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<Pairing> FindPairings(string genome, int minLen, int maxLen, int intervalMinLen, int intervalMaxLen)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int n = genome.Length;Di2015NewLine        var padding = new string((char)0, maxLen);Di2015NewLine        var padded = string.Concat(padding, genome, padding);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int start = (intervalMinLen + minLen)/2 + maxLen;Di2015NewLine        int end = n - (intervalMinLen + minLen)/2 + maxLen;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Consider 'fold locations' along the genomeDi2015NewLine        for (int i=start; i<end; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Consider 'odd' folding (centered on index) about index iDi2015NewLine            int k = (intervalMinLen+2)/2;Di2015NewLine            int maxK = (intervalMaxLen + 2)/2;Di2015NewLine            while (k<=maxK)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int matchLength = 0;Di2015NewLine                while (IsPaired(padded[i - k], padded[i + k]) && (k <= (maxK+maxLen)))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    matchLength++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (matchLength >= minLen && matchLength <= maxLen)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        yield return new Pairing(i-k - maxLen, matchLength, 2*k - (matchLength-1));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    k++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                k++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Consider 'even' folding (centered before index) about index iDi2015NewLine            k = (intervalMinLen+1)/2;Di2015NewLine            while (k <= maxK)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int matchLength = 0;Di2015NewLine                while (IsPaired(padded[i - (k+1)], padded[i + k]) && (k<=maxK+maxLen))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    matchLength++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (matchLength >= minLen && matchLength <= maxLen)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        yield return new Pairing(i - (k+1) - maxLen, matchLength, 2*k + 1 - (matchLength-1));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    k++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                k++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private const int SumAT = 'A' + 'T';Di2015NewLine    private const int SumGC = 'G' + 'C';Di2015NewLine    private static bool IsPaired(char a, char b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (a + b) == SumAT || (a + b) == SumGC;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string genome = "ATCAGGACCATACGCCTGAT";Di2015NewLine        foreach (var pairing in FindPairings(genome, 4, 5, 9, 10))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("'{0}' pair with '{1}'",Di2015NewLine                              genome.Substring(pairing.Index, pairing.Length),Di2015NewLine                              genome.Substring(pairing.Index + pairing.Offset, pairing.Length));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8814699Di2015UniqueSeparator    void webBrowser1_Navigating(object sender, NavigatingEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        String scheme = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            scheme = e.Uri.Scheme;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (scheme == null || scheme == "file")Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        // Not going to follow any other linkDi2015NewLine        e.Cancel = true;Di2015NewLine        if (scheme == "http")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Check if it's the "shared" URLDi2015NewLine            if (e.Uri.Host == "shared")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Start emailDi2015NewLine                EmailComposeTask emailComposeTask = new EmailComposeTask();Di2015NewLine                emailComposeTask.Subject = "Sharing an app with you";Di2015NewLine                emailComposeTask.Body = "You may like this app...";Di2015NewLine                emailComposeTask.Show();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // start it in Internet ExplorerDi2015NewLine                WebBrowserTask webBrowserTask = new WebBrowserTask();Di2015NewLine                webBrowserTask.Uri = new Uri(e.Uri.AbsoluteUri);Di2015NewLine                webBrowserTask.Show();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (scheme == "mailto")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            EmailComposeTask emailComposeTask = new EmailComposeTask();Di2015NewLine            emailComposeTask.To = e.Uri.AbsoluteUri;Di2015NewLine            emailComposeTask.Show();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8816383Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<PropertyInfo> FindProperties(object objectTree, Type targetType)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (targetType.IsAssignableFrom(objectTree.GetType()))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var properties = objectTree.GetType().GetProperties();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var property in properties)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return property;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (targetType.IsAssignableFrom(property.PropertyType))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                object instance = property.GetValue(objectTree, null);Di2015NewLine                foreach (var subproperty in FindProperties(instance, targetType))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    yield return subproperty;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8819149Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class QueryableExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IQueryable<TDest> ToDTO<TSource, TDest>(this IQueryable<TSource> source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<TDest> destinationList = new List<TDest>();Di2015NewLine        List<TSource> sourceList = source.ToList<TSource>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var sourceType = typeof(TSource);Di2015NewLine        var destType = typeof(TDest);Di2015NewLine        foreach (TSource sourceElement in sourceList)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TDest destElement = Activator.CreateInstance<TDest>();Di2015NewLine            //Get all properties from the object Di2015NewLine            PropertyInfo[] sourceProperties = typeof(TSource).GetProperties();Di2015NewLine            foreach (PropertyInfo sourceProperty in sourceProperties)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //and assign value to each propery according to property name.Di2015NewLine                PropertyInfo destProperty = destType.GetProperty(sourceProperty.Name);Di2015NewLine                destProperty.SetValue(destElement, sourceProperty.GetValue(sourceElement, null), null);Di2015NewLine                destinationList.Add(destElement);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return destinationList.AsQueryable();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8819758Di2015UniqueSeparatorGODi2015NewLine/* NORMAL METHOD */Di2015NewLineBEGINDi2015NewLineSET STATISTICS TIME ONDi2015NewLine--Di2015NewLineIF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM tempdb.dbo.sysobjects WHERE ID = OBJECT_ID(N'tempdb..#Store1'))Di2015NewLineBEGINDi2015NewLine    DROP TABLE #Store1Di2015NewLineENDDi2015NewLine-- NormalDi2015NewLineCREATE TABLE #Store1 (Id INT IDENTITY(1,1) PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED, Data VARCHAR(4000))Di2015NewLineCREATE UNIQUE CLUSTERED INDEX CIX_STORE1_DATA ON #Store1(Data)Di2015NewLine-- Help Create DataDi2015NewLineDECLARE @Data TABLE(Data VARCHAR(4000))Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO @Data(Data) VALUES ('red.'), ('YELLOW/'), ('green'), ('.BLUE'), ('/violet'), ('PURPLE-'), ('-orange')Di2015NewLine-- The data set we'll use for testingDi2015NewLineINSERT INTO @DataDi2015NewLine    SELECT a.Data + b.Data + c.Data + d.Data + e.Data + f.Data + g.Data Di2015NewLine    FROM @Data a, @Data b, @Data c, @Data d, @Data e, @Data f, @Data gDi2015NewLine-- INSERTION TESTSDi2015NewLinePRINT('INSERT INTO NORMAL')Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO #Store1(Data)Di2015NewLine    SELECT Data FROM @DataDi2015NewLine-- SELECTION TESTSDi2015NewLinePRINT('SELECT FROM NORMAL')Di2015NewLineSELECT TOP 5000 d.Data, (SELECT s.Id FROM #Store1 s WHERE s.Data = d.Data) FROM @Data d Di2015NewLine--Di2015NewLineSET STATISTICS TIME OFFDi2015NewLineEND Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLine/* USING YOUR OWN CHECKSUM/HASH */Di2015NewLineBEGINDi2015NewLineSET STATISTICS TIME ONDi2015NewLine--Di2015NewLineIF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM tempdb.dbo.sysobjects WHERE ID = OBJECT_ID(N'tempdb..#Store2'))Di2015NewLineBEGINDi2015NewLine    DROP TABLE #Store2Di2015NewLineENDDi2015NewLine-- With HashDi2015NewLineCREATE TABLE #Store2 (Id INT IDENTITY(1,1) PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED, Hsh INT, Data VARCHAR(4000))Di2015NewLineCREATE CLUSTERED INDEX CIX_STORE2_CRC ON #Store2(Hsh)Di2015NewLine-- Help Create DataDi2015NewLineDECLARE @Data TABLE(Data VARCHAR(4000))Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO @Data(Data) VALUES ('red.'), ('YELLOW/'), ('green'), ('.BLUE'), ('/violet'), ('PURPLE-'), ('-orange')Di2015NewLine-- The data set we'll use for testingDi2015NewLineINSERT INTO @DataDi2015NewLine    SELECT a.Data + b.Data + c.Data + d.Data + e.Data + f.Data + g.Data Di2015NewLine    FROM @Data a, @Data b, @Data c, @Data d, @Data e, @Data f, @Data gDi2015NewLine-- INSERTION TESTSDi2015NewLinePRINT('INSERT INTO CHECKSUM/HASH')Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO #Store2(Hsh, Data)Di2015NewLine    SELECT CHECKSUM(Data), Data FROM @DataDi2015NewLine-- SELECTION TESTSDi2015NewLinePRINT('SELECT FROM CHECKSUM/HASH')Di2015NewLineSELECT TOP 5000 d.Data, (SELECT s.Id FROM #Store2 s WHERE Hsh = CHECKSUM(d.Data) AND Data = d.Data) FROM @Data dDi2015NewLine--Di2015NewLineSET STATISTICS TIME OFFDi2015NewLineEND Di2015NewLine

8820439Di2015UniqueSeparator static Int64 GetInt64HashCode(string strText)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Int64 hashCode = 0;Di2015NewLine    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(strText))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Unicode Encode Covering all charactersetDi2015NewLine          byte[] byteContents = Encoding.Unicode.GetBytes(strText);Di2015NewLine        System.Security.Cryptography.SHA256 hash = Di2015NewLine        new System.Security.Cryptography.SHA256CryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine        byte[] hashText = hash.ComputeHash(byteContents);Di2015NewLine        //32Byte hashText separateDi2015NewLine        //hashCodeStart = 0~7  8ByteDi2015NewLine        //hashCodeMedium = 8~23  8ByteDi2015NewLine        //hashCodeEnd = 24~31  8ByteDi2015NewLine        //and FoldDi2015NewLine        Int64 hashCodeStart = BitConverter.ToInt64(hashText, 0);Di2015NewLine        Int64 hashCodeMedium = BitConverter.ToInt64(hashText, 8);Di2015NewLine        Int64 hashCodeEnd = BitConverter.ToInt64(hashText, 24);Di2015NewLine        hashCode = hashCodeStart ^ hashCodeMedium ^ hashCodeEnd;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return (hashCode);Di2015NewLine}  Di2015NewLine

8825862Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic string ReplaceNonCharacters(string aString, char replacement)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var sb = new StringBuilder(aString.Length);Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < aString.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (char.IsSurrogatePair(aString, i))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int c = char.ConvertToUtf32(aString, i);Di2015NewLine            i++;Di2015NewLine            if (IsCharacter(c))Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(char.ConvertFromUtf32(c));Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                sb.Append(replacement);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            char c = aString[i];Di2015NewLine            if (IsCharacter(c))Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(c);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                sb.Append(replacement);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic bool IsCharacter(int point)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return point < 0xFDD0 || // everything below here is fineDi2015NewLine        point > 0xFDEF &&    // exclude the 0xFFD0...0xFDEF non-charactersDi2015NewLine        (point & 0xfffE) != 0xFFFE; // exclude all other non-charactersDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8828700Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static string GetDescription(this object enumeration)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Again, not going to do your condition/error checking here.Di2015NewLine        //Normally I would have made this extension method for the Enum typeDi2015NewLine        but you won't know the type at compile time when building the list of descriptions but ..Di2015NewLine        // you will know its an object so that is how I cheated around it.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var desc = enumeration.GetType().GetMember(enumeration.ToString())[0]Di2015NewLine            .GetCustomAttributes(typeof(DescriptionAttribute), true) as DescriptionAttribute[];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (desc != null && desc.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return desc[0].Description;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return enumeration.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
8828700Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IList<string> GetDescriptions<E>(E type)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //I'm not going to do your error checking for you. Di2015NewLine    //Figure out what you want to do in the event that this isn't an enumeration. Di2015NewLine    //Or design it to support different cases. =PDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var list = new List<string>(); Di2015NewLine    foreach(var name in Enum.GetNames(typeof(E)))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var enumObj = (E) Enum.Parse(typeof(E), name);Di2015NewLine        list.Add(enumObj.GetDescription());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return list;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8829389Di2015UniqueSeparator// Variant 1: Using strings all the wayDi2015NewLinepublic void DynamicQueryExample(string property, dynamic val)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   List<DataItem> repository = new List<DataItem>(){Di2015NewLine        new DataItem() {Di2015NewLine            new Data("Name", "Mike"),Di2015NewLine            new Data("Age", 25),Di2015NewLine            new Data("BirthDate", new DateTime(1987, 1, 5))Di2015NewLine        },Di2015NewLine        new DataItem() {Di2015NewLine            new Data("Name", "Steve"),Di2015NewLine            new Data("Age", 30),Di2015NewLine            new Data("BirthDate", new DateTime(1982, 1, 10))Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Use string comparison all the time        Di2015NewLine    string predicate = "it[\\"{0}\\"].ToString() == \\"{1}\\"";Di2015NewLine    predicate = String.Format(whereClause , property, val.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var result = repository.AsQueryable<DataItem>().Where(predicate);Di2015NewLine    if (result.Count() == 1)Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(result.Single()["Name"]);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineProgram p = new Program();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinep.DynamicQueryExample("Age", 30); // Prints "Steve"Di2015NewLinep.DynamicQueryExample("BirthDate", new DateTime(1982, 1, 10)); // Prints "Steve"Di2015NewLinep.DynamicQueryExample("Name", "Mike"); // Prints "Steve" (nah, just joking...)Di2015NewLine
8829389Di2015UniqueSeparator// Variant 2: Detecting the type at runtime.Di2015NewLinepublic void DynamicQueryExample(string property, string val)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<DataItem> repository = new List<DataItem>(){Di2015NewLine        new DataItem() {Di2015NewLine            new Data("Name", "Mike"),Di2015NewLine            new Data("Age", 25),Di2015NewLine            new Data("BirthDate", new DateTime(1987, 1, 5))Di2015NewLine        },Di2015NewLine        new DataItem() {Di2015NewLine            new Data("Name", "Steve"),Di2015NewLine            new Data("Age", 30),Di2015NewLine            new Data("BirthDate", new DateTime(1982, 1, 10))Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string whereClause = "{0}(it[\\"{1}\\"]) == {2}";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Discover the type at runtime (and convert accordingly)Di2015NewLine    Type type = repository.First()[property].GetType();Di2015NewLine    string stype = type.ToString();Di2015NewLine    stype = stype.Substring(stype.LastIndexOf('.') + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (type.Equals(typeof(string))) {Di2015NewLine        // Need to surround formatting directive with ""Di2015NewLine        whereClause = whereClause.Replace("{2}", "\\"{2}\\"");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    string predicate = String.Format(whereClause, stype, property, val);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var result = repository.AsQueryable<DataItem>().Where(predicate);Di2015NewLine    if (result.Count() == 1)Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(result.Single()["Name"]);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar p = new Program();Di2015NewLinep.DynamicQueryExample("Age", "30");Di2015NewLinep.DynamicQueryExample("BirthDate", "DateTime(1982, 1, 10)");Di2015NewLinep.DynamicQueryExample("Name", "Mike");Di2015NewLine

8835237Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class NullableValueProvider : IValueProviderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly object _defaultValue;Di2015NewLine    private readonly IValueProvider _underlyingValueProvider;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public NullableValueProvider(MemberInfo memberInfo, Type underlyingType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _underlyingValueProvider = new DynamicValueProvider(memberInfo);Di2015NewLine        _defaultValue = Activator.CreateInstance(underlyingType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void SetValue(object target, object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _underlyingValueProvider.SetValue(target, value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object GetValue(object target)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _underlyingValueProvider.GetValue(target) ?? _defaultValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class SpecialContractResolver : DefaultContractResolverDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override IValueProvider CreateMemberValueProvider(MemberInfo member)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(member.MemberType == MemberTypes.Property)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var pi = (PropertyInfo) member;Di2015NewLine            if (pi.PropertyType.IsGenericType && pi.PropertyType.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof (Nullable<>))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return new NullableValueProvider(member, pi.PropertyType.GetGenericArguments().First());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if(member.MemberType == MemberTypes.Field)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var fi = (FieldInfo) member;Di2015NewLine            if(fi.FieldType.IsGenericType && fi.FieldType.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(Nullable<>))Di2015NewLine                return new NullableValueProvider(member, fi.FieldType.GetGenericArguments().First());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return base.CreateMemberValueProvider(member);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8836177Di2015UniqueSeparatorpartID, partStock, isAssemblyDi2015NewLinep1      100        falseDi2015NewLinep2      100        falseDi2015NewLinep3      100        falseDi2015NewLineass1    10         trueDi2015NewLineass2    10         trueDi2015NewLine

8836177Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid UpdateStock(string partID, int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    formulas = "select * from FORMULA where partID = " + partID;Di2015NewLine    foreach(formula in formulas)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        subPart = "select * from PARTS where partID = " + formula.partID;Di2015NewLine        subCount = count * formula.quantity;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Check for sufficient stock of this partDi2015NewLine        shortage = (subPart.partStock - subCount) * -1;Di2015NewLine        if(shortage > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // When this part is an assembly we can try to 'build' more.Di2015NewLine            if(subPart.isAssembly)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                UpdateStock(formula.partID, shortage);Di2015NewLine                // Note that when making more isn't possibleDi2015NewLine                // this will throw an error.Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Otherwise there simple isn't enough.Di2015NewLine                throw Error("Not enough stock");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Once we get here there should be enough stock, Di2015NewLine        // either because there was enough in the first placeDi2015NewLine        // or because we made more. Di2015NewLine        subPart.partStock = subPart.partStock - subCount;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Lastly increase the actual stock.Di2015NewLine    part = "select * from PARTS where partID = " + partID;Di2015NewLine    part.partStock = part.partStock + count;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8839358Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring.GetHashCode()
8839358Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEqualityComparer<T>
8839358Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ConsistentGuaranteedComparer : IEqualityComparer<string>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public bool Equals(string x, string y)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return x == y;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  public int GetHashCode(string obj)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if(obj == null)Di2015NewLine      return 0;Di2015NewLine    int hash = obj.Length;Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i != obj.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine      hash = hash << 5 - hash + obj[i];Di2015NewLine    return hash;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8839358Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class RandomComparer : IEqualityComparer<string>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  private int hashSeed = Environment.TickCount;Di2015NewLine  public bool Equals(string x, string y)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return x == y;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  public int GetHashCode(string obj)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if(obj == null)Di2015NewLine      return 0;Di2015NewLine    int hash = hashSeed + obj.Length;Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i != obj.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine      hash = hash << 5 - hash + obj[i];Di2015NewLine    hash += (hash <<  15) ^ 0xffffcd7d;Di2015NewLine    hash ^= (hash >>> 10);Di2015NewLine    hash += (hash <<   3);Di2015NewLine    hash ^= (hash >>>  6);Di2015NewLine    hash += (hash <<   2) + (hash << 14);Di2015NewLine    return hash ^ (hash >>> 16)Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8841688Di2015UniqueSeparatorOriginAtMargins
8841688Di2015UniqueSeparatorfalse
8841688Di2015UniqueSeparatorOriginAtMargins
8841688Di2015UniqueSeparatortrue
8841688Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrintDocument.OriginsAtMargins
8841688Di2015UniqueSeparatorfalse
8841688Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrintDocument.OriginsAtMargins
8841688Di2015UniqueSeparatortrue
8841688Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrintAction printAction = PrintAction.PrintToFile;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void printDocument_BeginPrint(object sender, PrintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Save our print action so we know if we are printing Di2015NewLine    // a preview or a real document.Di2015NewLine    printAction = e.PrintAction;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Set some preferences, our method should print a box with any Di2015NewLine    // combination of these properties being true/false.Di2015NewLine    printDocument.OriginAtMargins = false;   //true = soft margins, false = hard marginsDi2015NewLine    printDocument.DefaultPageSettings.Landscape = false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void printDocument_PrintPage(object sender, PrintPageEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Graphics g = e.Graphics;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If you set printDocumet.OriginAtMargins to 'false' this event Di2015NewLine    // will print the largest rectangle your printer is physically Di2015NewLine    // capable of. This is often 1/8" - 1/4" from each page edge.Di2015NewLine    // ----------Di2015NewLine    // If you set printDocument.OriginAtMargins to 'false' this eventDi2015NewLine    // will print the largest rectangle permitted by the currently Di2015NewLine    // configured page margins. By default the page margins are Di2015NewLine    // usually 1" from each page edge but can be configured by the endDi2015NewLine    // user or overridden in your code.Di2015NewLine    // (ex: printDocument.DefaultPageSettings.Margins)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Grab a copy of our "soft margins" (configured printer settings)Di2015NewLine    // Defaults to 1 inch margins, but could be configured otherwise by Di2015NewLine    // the end user. You can also specify some default page margins in Di2015NewLine    // your printDocument.DefaultPageSetting properties.Di2015NewLine    RectangleF marginBounds = e.MarginBounds;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Grab a copy of our "hard margins" (printer's capabilities) Di2015NewLine    // This varies between printer models. Software printers like Di2015NewLine    // CutePDF will have no "physical limitations" and so will return Di2015NewLine    // the full page size 850,1100 for a letter page size.Di2015NewLine    RectangleF printableArea = e.PageSettings.PrintableArea;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If we are print to a print preview control, the origin won't have Di2015NewLine    // been automatically adjusted for the printer's physical limitations. Di2015NewLine    // So let's adjust the origin for preview to reflect the printer's Di2015NewLine    // hard margins.Di2015NewLine    if (printAction == PrintAction.PrintToPreview)Di2015NewLine        g.TranslateTransform(printableArea.X, printableArea.Y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Are we using soft margins or hard margins? Lets grab the correct Di2015NewLine    // width/height from either the soft/hard margin rectangles. The Di2015NewLine    // hard margins are usually a little wider than the soft margins.Di2015NewLine    // ----------Di2015NewLine    // Note: Margins are automatically applied to the rotated page size Di2015NewLine    // when the page is set to landscape, but physical hard margins are Di2015NewLine    // not (the printer is not physically rotating any mechanics inside, Di2015NewLine    // the paper still travels through the printer the same way. So we Di2015NewLine    // rotate in software for landscape)Di2015NewLine    int availableWidth = (int)Math.Floor(printDocument.OriginAtMargins ? marginBounds.Width : (e.PageSettings.Landscape ? printableArea.Height : printableArea.Width));Di2015NewLine    int availableHeight = (int)Math.Floor(printDocument.OriginAtMargins ? marginBounds.Height : (e.PageSettings.Landscape ? printableArea.Width : printableArea.Height));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Draw our rectangle which will either be the soft margin rectangle Di2015NewLine    // or the hard margin (printer capabilities) rectangle.Di2015NewLine    // ----------Di2015NewLine    // Note: we adjust the width and height minus one as it is a zero, Di2015NewLine    // zero based co-ordinates system. This will put the rectangle just Di2015NewLine    // inside the available width and height.Di2015NewLine    g.DrawRectangle(Pens.Red, 0, 0, availableWidth - 1, availableHeight - 1);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8841688Di2015UniqueSeparatorMath.Floor()
8841688Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrintAction printAction = PrintAction.PrintToFile;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void printDocument_BeginPrint(object sender, PrintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Save our print action so we know if we are printing Di2015NewLine    // a preview or a real document.Di2015NewLine    printAction = e.PrintAction;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // We ALWAYS want true here, as we will implement the Di2015NewLine    // margin limitations later in code.Di2015NewLine    printDocument.OriginAtMargins = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Set some preferences, our method should print a box with any Di2015NewLine    // combination of these properties being true/false.Di2015NewLine    printDocument.DefaultPageSettings.Landscape = false;Di2015NewLine    printDocument.DefaultPageSettings.Margins.Top = 100;Di2015NewLine    printDocument.DefaultPageSettings.Margins.Left = 0;Di2015NewLine    printDocument.DefaultPageSettings.Margins.Right = 50;Di2015NewLine    printDocument.DefaultPageSettings.Margins.Bottom = 0;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void printDocument_PrintPage(object sender, PrintPageEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Graphics g = e.Graphics;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If you set printDocumet.OriginAtMargins to 'false' this event Di2015NewLine    // will print the largest rectangle your printer is physically Di2015NewLine    // capable of. This is often 1/8" - 1/4" from each page edge.Di2015NewLine    // ----------Di2015NewLine    // If you set printDocument.OriginAtMargins to 'false' this eventDi2015NewLine    // will print the largest rectangle permitted by the currently Di2015NewLine    // configured page margins. By default the page margins are Di2015NewLine    // usually 1" from each page edge but can be configured by the endDi2015NewLine    // user or overridden in your code.Di2015NewLine    // (ex: printDocument.DefaultPageSettings.Margins)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Grab a copy of our "hard margins" (printer's capabilities) Di2015NewLine    // This varies between printer models. Software printers like Di2015NewLine    // CutePDF will have no "physical limitations" and so will return Di2015NewLine    // the full page size 850,1100 for a letter page size.Di2015NewLine    RectangleF printableArea = e.PageSettings.PrintableArea;Di2015NewLine    RectangleF realPrintableArea = new RectangleF(Di2015NewLine        (e.PageSettings.Landscape ? printableArea.Y : printableArea.X),Di2015NewLine        (e.PageSettings.Landscape ? printableArea.X : printableArea.Y),Di2015NewLine        (e.PageSettings.Landscape ? printableArea.Height : printableArea.Width),Di2015NewLine        (e.PageSettings.Landscape ? printableArea.Width : printableArea.Height)Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If we are printing to a print preview control, the origin won't have Di2015NewLine    // been automatically adjusted for the printer's physical limitations. Di2015NewLine    // So let's adjust the origin for preview to reflect the printer's Di2015NewLine    // hard margins.Di2015NewLine    // ----------Di2015NewLine    // Otherwise if we really are printing, just use the soft margins.Di2015NewLine    g.TranslateTransform(Di2015NewLine        ((printAction == PrintAction.PrintToPreview) ? realPrintableArea.X : 0) - e.MarginBounds.X,Di2015NewLine        ((printAction == PrintAction.PrintToPreview) ? realPrintableArea.Y : 0) - e.MarginBounds.YDi2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Draw the printable area rectangle in PURPLEDi2015NewLine    Rectangle printedPrintableArea = Rectangle.Truncate(realPrintableArea);Di2015NewLine    printedPrintableArea.Width--;Di2015NewLine    printedPrintableArea.Height--;Di2015NewLine    g.DrawRectangle(Pens.Purple, printedPrintableArea);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Grab a copy of our "soft margins" (configured printer settings)Di2015NewLine    // Defaults to 1 inch margins, but could be configured otherwise by Di2015NewLine    // the end user. You can also specify some default page margins in Di2015NewLine    // your printDocument.DefaultPageSetting properties.Di2015NewLine    RectangleF marginBounds = e.MarginBounds;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This intersects the desired margins with the printable area rectangle. Di2015NewLine    // If the margins go outside the printable area on any edge, it will be Di2015NewLine    // brought in to the appropriate printable area.Di2015NewLine    marginBounds.Intersect(realPrintableArea);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Draw the margin rectangle in REDDi2015NewLine    Rectangle printedMarginArea = Rectangle.Truncate(marginBounds);Di2015NewLine    printedMarginArea.Width--;Di2015NewLine    printedMarginArea.Height--;Di2015NewLine    g.DrawRectangle(Pens.Red, printedMarginArea);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8844240Di2015UniqueSeparatorFor each (Element1,Element2) pair:Di2015NewLine    match Element1,Element2 on "(x+|z+)" -> matches1,matches2Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (i=0;i<min(matches1,matches2);i++) {Di2015NewLine        replace 'x+' by '([A-Za-z0-9]{matches1[i].Length})'Di2015NewLine        // note: need the brackets here to act as capturing bracketsDi2015NewLine        // so that backreferences can be used!Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if matches2[i] is 'xxxxx':Di2015NewLine            replace 'x+' by '(?!\\i)[A-Za-z0--9]{matches2[i].Length}'Di2015NewLine        else if matches2[i] is 'zzzzz':Di2015NewLine            replace 'z+' by '\\i'Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Then replace miscellaneous leftover 'xxxx' by '[A-Za-z0-9]{lengthofmatch}'.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Then join the new Element1 and Element2 by a delimiter e.g. '-'Di2015NewLine

8845111Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing Org.BouncyCastle.Asn1;Di2015NewLineusing Org.BouncyCastle.Crypto;Di2015NewLineusing Org.BouncyCastle.Crypto.Parameters;Di2015NewLineusing Org.BouncyCastle.OpenSsl;Di2015NewLineusing Org.BouncyCastle.Security;Di2015NewLineusing Org.BouncyCastle.Utilities.Encoders;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace API.CryptoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class RsaSha1SigningDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private RsaKeyParameters MakeKey(String modulusHexString, String exponentHexString, bool isPrivateKey)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var modulus = new Org.BouncyCastle.Math.BigInteger(modulusHexString, 16);Di2015NewLine            var exponent = new Org.BouncyCastle.Math.BigInteger(exponentHexString, 16);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return new RsaKeyParameters(isPrivateKey, modulus, exponent);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public String Sign(String data, String privateModulusHexString, String privateExponentHexString)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            /* Make the key */Di2015NewLine            RsaKeyParameters key = MakeKey(privateModulusHexString, privateExponentHexString, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* Init alg */Di2015NewLine            ISigner sig = SignerUtilities.GetSigner("SHA1withRSA");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* Populate key */Di2015NewLine            sig.Init(true, key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* Get the bytes to be signed from the string */Di2015NewLine            var bytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* Calc the signature */Di2015NewLine            sig.BlockUpdate(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine            byte[] signature = sig.GenerateSignature();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* Base 64 encode the sig so its 8-bit clean */Di2015NewLine            var signedString = Convert.ToBase64String(signature);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return signedString;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool Verify(String data, String expectedSignature, String publicModulusHexString, String publicExponentHexString)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            /* Make the key */Di2015NewLine            RsaKeyParameters key = MakeKey(publicModulusHexString, publicExponentHexString, false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* Init alg */Di2015NewLine            ISigner signer = SignerUtilities.GetSigner("SHA1withRSA");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* Populate key */Di2015NewLine            signer.Init(false, key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* Get the signature into bytes */Di2015NewLine            var expectedSig = Convert.FromBase64String(expectedSignature);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* Get the bytes to be signed from the string */Di2015NewLine            var msgBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* Calculate the signature and see if it matches */Di2015NewLine            signer.BlockUpdate(msgBytes, 0, msgBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine            return signer.VerifySignature(expectedSig);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8847232Di2015UniqueSeparatorcardGameValue

8847232Di2015UniqueSeparatorlast
8847232Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic int cardGameValue(int[] D, int first, int last) {Di2015NewLine    scores = new int[last + 1, last + 1];Di2015NewLine    return cardGameValue(D, first, last, scores);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic int cardGameValue(int[] D, int first, int last, int[,] scores) {Di2015NewLine    // If we have at most 1 card, our score is 0:Di2015NewLine    if (first >= last)Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Otherwise, get the score from the cache array. Di2015NewLine    // If it is positive, return the value.Di2015NewLine    int score = scores[first, last];Di2015NewLine    if (score > 0)Di2015NewLine        return score;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Keep the original first and last Di2015NewLine    // for filling in the computed value later.Di2015NewLine    int firstOriginal = first;Di2015NewLine    int lastOriginal = last;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Let the opponent pick a card:Di2015NewLine    if (D[first] <= D[last])Di2015NewLine        last--;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        first++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Choose our best card:Di2015NewLine    int left = D[first] + cardGameValue(D, first + 1, last, scores);Di2015NewLine    int right = D[last] + cardGameValue(D, first, last - 1, scores);Di2015NewLine    score = Math.Max(left, right);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // and enter the score into the cache array:Di2015NewLine    scores[firstOriginal, lastOriginal] = score;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Finally, return the computed score.Di2015NewLine    return score;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8847609Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static Func<T1, T2> CreateMapping<T1, T2>()Di2015NewLine        where T2 : new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var typeOfSource = typeof(T1);Di2015NewLine        var typeOfDestination = typeof(T2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // use reflection to get a list of the properties on the source and destination typesDi2015NewLine        var sourceProperties = typeOfSource.GetProperties();Di2015NewLine        var destinationProperties = typeOfDestination.GetProperties();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // join the source properties with the destination properties based on nameDi2015NewLine        var properties = from sourceProperty in sourcePropertiesDi2015NewLine                         join destinationProperty in destinationPropertiesDi2015NewLine                         on sourceProperty.Name equals destinationProperty.NameDi2015NewLine                         select new { SourceProperty = sourceProperty, DestinationProperty = destinationProperty };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (x) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var y = new T2();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var property in properties)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var value = property.SourceProperty.GetValue(x, null);Di2015NewLine                property.DestinationProperty.SetValue(y, value, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return y;Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Fill<T1, T2>(List<T1> Source, List<T2> Destination)Di2015NewLine        where T2 : new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Destination.AddRange(Source.Select(CreateMapping<T1, T2>()));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8847845Di2015UniqueSeparatorColorRGB
8847845Di2015UniqueSeparatorColor
8847845Di2015UniqueSeparatorH

8847845Di2015UniqueSeparator  public class ColorRGBDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    public byte R;Di2015NewLine    public byte G;Di2015NewLine    public byte B;Di2015NewLine    public byte A;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ColorRGB()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      R = 255;Di2015NewLine      G = 255;Di2015NewLine      B = 255;Di2015NewLine      A = 255;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ColorRGB(Color value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      this.R = value.R;Di2015NewLine      this.G = value.G;Di2015NewLine      this.B = value.B;Di2015NewLine      this.A = value.A;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static implicit operator Color(ColorRGB rgb)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Color c = Color.FromArgb(rgb.A, rgb.R, rgb.G, rgb.B);Di2015NewLine      return c;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static explicit operator ColorRGB(Color c)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      return new ColorRGB(c);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Given H,S,L in range of 0-1Di2015NewLine    // Returns a Color (RGB struct) in range of 0-255Di2015NewLine    public static ColorRGB FromHSL(double H, double S, double L)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      return FromHSLA(H, S, L, 1.0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Given H,S,L,A in range of 0-1Di2015NewLine    // Returns a Color (RGB struct) in range of 0-255Di2015NewLine    public static ColorRGB FromHSLA(double H, double S, double L, double A)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      double v;Di2015NewLine      double r, g, b;Di2015NewLine      if (A > 1.0)Di2015NewLine        A = 1.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      r = L;   // default to grayDi2015NewLine      g = L;Di2015NewLine      b = L;Di2015NewLine      v = (L <= 0.5) ? (L * (1.0 + S)) : (L + S - L * S);Di2015NewLine      if (v > 0)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        double m;Di2015NewLine        double sv;Di2015NewLine        int sextant;Di2015NewLine        double fract, vsf, mid1, mid2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        m = L + L - v;Di2015NewLine        sv = (v - m) / v;Di2015NewLine        H *= 6.0;Di2015NewLine        sextant = (int)H;Di2015NewLine        fract = H - sextant;Di2015NewLine        vsf = v * sv * fract;Di2015NewLine        mid1 = m + vsf;Di2015NewLine        mid2 = v - vsf;Di2015NewLine        switch (sextant)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          case 0:Di2015NewLine            r = v;Di2015NewLine            g = mid1;Di2015NewLine            b = m;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine          case 1:Di2015NewLine            r = mid2;Di2015NewLine            g = v;Di2015NewLine            b = m;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine          case 2:Di2015NewLine            r = m;Di2015NewLine            g = v;Di2015NewLine            b = mid1;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine          case 3:Di2015NewLine            r = m;Di2015NewLine            g = mid2;Di2015NewLine            b = v;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine          case 4:Di2015NewLine            r = mid1;Di2015NewLine            g = m;Di2015NewLine            b = v;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine          case 5:Di2015NewLine            r = v;Di2015NewLine            g = m;Di2015NewLine            b = mid2;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      ColorRGB rgb = new ColorRGB();Di2015NewLine      rgb.R = Convert.ToByte(r * 255.0f);Di2015NewLine      rgb.G = Convert.ToByte(g * 255.0f);Di2015NewLine      rgb.B = Convert.ToByte(b * 255.0f);Di2015NewLine      rgb.A = Convert.ToByte(A * 255.0f);Di2015NewLine      return rgb;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Hue in range from 0.0 to 1.0Di2015NewLine    public float HDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      getDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        // Use System.Drawing.Color.GetHue, but divide by 360.0F Di2015NewLine        // because System.Drawing.Color returns hue in degrees (0 - 360)Di2015NewLine        // rather than a number between 0 and 1.Di2015NewLine        return ((Color)this).GetHue() / 360.0F;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Saturation in range 0.0 - 1.0Di2015NewLine    public float SDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      getDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        return ((Color)this).GetSaturation();Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Lightness in range 0.0 - 1.0Di2015NewLine    public float LDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      getDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        return ((Color)this).GetBrightness();Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

8852693Di2015UniqueSeparatoriTextSharp.text.pdf.parser.TextRenderInfo
8852693Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class TextAsParagraphsExtractionStrategy : iTextSharp.text.pdf.parser.ITextExtractionStrategy {Di2015NewLine        //Text bufferDi2015NewLine        private StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Store last used propertiesDi2015NewLine        private Vector lastBaseLine;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Buffer of lines of text and their Y coordinates. NOTE, these should be exposed as properties instead of fields but are left as is for simplicity's sakeDi2015NewLine        public List<string> strings = new List<String>();Di2015NewLine        public List<float> baselines = new List<float>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //This is called whenever a run of text is encounteredDi2015NewLine        public void RenderText(iTextSharp.text.pdf.parser.TextRenderInfo renderInfo) {Di2015NewLine            //This code assumes that if the baseline changes then we're on a newlineDi2015NewLine            Vector curBaseline = renderInfo.GetBaseline().GetStartPoint();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //See if the baseline has changedDi2015NewLine            if ((this.lastBaseLine != null) && (curBaseline[Vector.I2] != lastBaseLine[Vector.I2])) {Di2015NewLine                //See if we have text and not just whitespaceDi2015NewLine                if ((!String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(this.result.ToString()))) {Di2015NewLine                    //Mark the previous line as done by adding it to our buffersDi2015NewLine                    this.baselines.Add(this.lastBaseLine[Vector.I2]);Di2015NewLine                    this.strings.Add(this.result.ToString());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                //Reset our "line" bufferDi2015NewLine                this.result.Clear();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Append the current text to our line bufferDi2015NewLine            this.result.Append(renderInfo.GetText());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Reset the last used lineDi2015NewLine            this.lastBaseLine = curBaseline;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string GetResultantText() {Di2015NewLine            //One last time, see if there's anything left in the bufferDi2015NewLine            if ((!String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(this.result.ToString()))) {Di2015NewLine                this.baselines.Add(this.lastBaseLine[Vector.I2]);Di2015NewLine                this.strings.Add(this.result.ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            //We're not going to use this method to return a string, instead after callers should inspect this class's strings and baselines fields.Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Not needed, part of interface contractDi2015NewLine        public void BeginTextBlock() { }Di2015NewLine        public void EndTextBlock() { }Di2015NewLine        public void RenderImage(ImageRenderInfo renderInfo) { }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8853530Di2015UniqueSeparator//Even though the date internaly stores the year as YYYY, using formatting, theDi2015NewLine//UI can have the format in YY.  Di2015NewLineprivate static void ShortFormDateFormat(DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs formatting)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (formatting.Value != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            System.Text.StringBuilder dateString = new System.Text.StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine            DateTime theDate = DateTime.Parse(formatting.Value.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            dateString.Append(theDate.Month);Di2015NewLine            dateString.Append("/");Di2015NewLine            dateString.Append(theDate.Day);Di2015NewLine            dateString.Append("/");Di2015NewLine            dateString.Append(theDate.Year.ToString().Substring(2));Di2015NewLine            formatting.Value = dateString.ToString();Di2015NewLine            formatting.FormattingApplied = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (FormatException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Set to false in case there are other handlers interested trying toDi2015NewLine            // format this DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs instance.Di2015NewLine            formatting.FormattingApplied = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8854787Di2015UniqueSeparator[TypeConverter(typeof(CustomColorTypeConverter))]Di2015NewLinepublic class CustomColorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static CustomColor Stop = new CustomColor { Color = Color.Red };Di2015NewLine    public static CustomColor Go = new CustomColor { Color = Color.Green };Di2015NewLine    public static CustomColor Yield = new CustomColor { Color = Color.Yellow };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Color Color { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal static CustomColor Find(Color color)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (color == CustomColor.Stop.Color)Di2015NewLine            return CustomColor.Stop;Di2015NewLine        else if (color == CustomColor.Go.Color)Di2015NewLine            return CustomColor.Go;Di2015NewLine        else if (color == CustomColor.Yield.Color)Di2015NewLine            return CustomColor.Yield;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new CustomColor { Color = Color.Transparent };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8855252Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static void DoTest()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var openFileDialog = new OpenFileDialog { Multiselect = true };Di2015NewLine        da_i2k_input_file_info in_file_info;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        openFileDialog.ShowDialog();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        in_file_info.image_path = null; // use full path in .image_filesDi2015NewLine        in_file_info.num_images = openFileDialog.FileNames.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create an array of IntPtrs.Di2015NewLine        IntPtr[] image_files_array = new IntPtr[in_file_info.num_images];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Each IntPtr array element will point to a copy of aDi2015NewLine        // string element in the openFileDialog.FileNames array.Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < openFileDialog.FileNames.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            image_files_array[i] = Marshal.StringToCoTaskMemUni(openFileDialog.FileNames[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // In order to obtain the address of the IntPtr array, Di2015NewLine        // we must fix it in memory. We do this using GCHandle.Di2015NewLine        GCHandle gch = GCHandle.Alloc(image_files_array, GCHandleType.Pinned);Di2015NewLine        // pimage_files will point to the head of the IntPtr array.Di2015NewLine        IntPtr pimage_files = gch.AddrOfPinnedObject();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set pimage_files as the value of the "image_files" field/Di2015NewLine        in_file_info.image_files = pimage_files;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Call a Test API.Di2015NewLine        TestStructure(in_file_info);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // After the API is called, free the GCHandle.Di2015NewLine        gch.Free();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Free each string contained in the IntPtr array.Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < openFileDialog.FileNames.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Marshal.FreeCoTaskMem(image_files_array[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8855308Di2015UniqueSeparator    protected void RadGrid1_NeedDataSource(object sender, GridNeedDataSourceEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<Employee> empList = GetEmployeeDetails();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DataSet dataset = new DataSet("DataSet");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        System.Data.DataTable dt1 = new System.Data.DataTable();Di2015NewLine        dt1.TableName = "Employee";Di2015NewLine        dt1.Columns.Add("EmpId");Di2015NewLine        dt1.Columns.Add("Name");Di2015NewLine        dt1.Columns.Add("Age");Di2015NewLine        dataset.Tables.Add(dt1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        System.Data.DataTable dt2 = new System.Data.DataTable();Di2015NewLine        dt2.TableName = "Address";Di2015NewLine        dt2.Columns.Add("EmpId");Di2015NewLine        dt2.Columns.Add("Street");Di2015NewLine        dt2.Columns.Add("City");Di2015NewLine        dt2.Columns.Add("Zip");Di2015NewLine        dataset.Tables.Add(dt2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Employee emp in empList)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dt1.Rows.Add(new object[] { emp.EmpId, emp.Name, emp.Age });Di2015NewLine            foreach (Address add in emp.Address)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                dt2.Rows.Add(new object[] { emp.EmpId, add.Street, add.City, add.Zip });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        RadGrid1.MasterTableView.DataSource = dataset.Tables["Employee"];Di2015NewLine        RadGrid1.MasterTableView.DetailTables[0].DataSource = dataset.Tables["Address"];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8857156Di2015UniqueSeparatorMethodInfo getSyntax = typeof(UriParser).GetMethod("GetSyntax", System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static | System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic);Di2015NewLineFieldInfo flagsField = typeof(UriParser).GetField("m_Flags", System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance | System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic);Di2015NewLineif (getSyntax != null && flagsField != null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   foreach (string scheme in new[] { "http", "https" })Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       UriParser parser = (UriParser)getSyntax.Invoke(null, new object[] { scheme });Di2015NewLine       if (parser != null)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           int flagsValue = (int)flagsField.GetValue(parser);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           //0x20000 is the SimpleUserSyntax attributeDi2015NewLine           if ((flagsValue & 0x20000) != 0)Di2015NewLine              flagsField.SetValue(parser, flagsValue & ~0x20000);Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineUri u = new Uri("http://host.com?arg1=val&arg=val2%3d");Di2015NewLine//At this point, the %3d remains as expected.Di2015NewLine

8860320Di2015UniqueSeparatorselectDi2015NewLineread_stall_ms = case when num_of_reads = 0 then 0 else (io_stall_read_ms/num_of_reads) end,Di2015NewLinewrite_stall_ms = case when io_stall_write_ms = 0 then 0 else (io_stall_write_ms/num_of_writes) end,Di2015NewLinetotal_stall_ms = case when (num_of_reads = 0 and num_of_writes = 0) then 0 else (io_stall/(num_of_reads + num_of_writes)) end,Di2015NewLinedb = db_name(vfs.database_id),Di2015NewLinemf.physical_name,Di2015NewLinevfs.*Di2015NewLinefrom sys.dm_io_virtual_file_stats(null, null) as vfsDi2015NewLinejoin sys.master_files as mf on vfs.database_id = mf.database_id and vfs.file_id = mf.file_idDi2015NewLineorder by total_stall_ms descDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineselect m.database_id,Di2015NewLinedb_name(m.database_id) as database_name,Di2015NewLinem.file_id,Di2015NewLinem.name as file_name, Di2015NewLinem.physical_name, Di2015NewLinem.type_desc,Di2015NewLinefs.num_of_reads, Di2015NewLinefs.num_of_bytes_read, Di2015NewLinefs.io_stall_read_ms, Di2015NewLinefs.num_of_writes, Di2015NewLinefs.num_of_bytes_written, Di2015NewLinefs.io_stall_write_msDi2015NewLinefrom sys.dm_io_virtual_file_stats(NULL, NULL) fsDi2015NewLinejoin sys.master_files m on fs.database_id = m.database_id and fs.file_id = m.file_idDi2015NewLine
8860320Di2015UniqueSeparatorselect db_name(d.database_id) as database_name, Di2015NewLinequotename(object_schema_name(d.object_id, d.database_id)) + N'.' + quotename(object_name(d.object_id, d.database_id)) as object_name,Di2015NewLined.database_id,Di2015NewLined.object_id,Di2015NewLined.page_io_latch_wait_count,Di2015NewLined.page_io_latch_wait_in_ms,Di2015NewLined.range_scans,Di2015NewLined.index_lookups,Di2015NewLinecase when mid.database_id is null then 'N' else 'Y' end as missing_index_identifiedDi2015NewLinefrom (select Di2015NewLine        database_id,Di2015NewLine        object_id,Di2015NewLine        row_number() over (partition by database_id order by sum(page_io_latch_wait_in_ms) desc) as row_number,Di2015NewLine        sum(page_io_latch_wait_count) as page_io_latch_wait_count,Di2015NewLine        sum(page_io_latch_wait_in_ms) as page_io_latch_wait_in_ms,Di2015NewLine        sum(range_scan_count) as range_scans,Di2015NewLine        sum(singleton_lookup_count) as index_lookupsDi2015NewLine    from sys.dm_db_index_operational_stats(NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL)Di2015NewLine    where page_io_latch_wait_count > 0Di2015NewLine    group by database_id, object_id ) as dDi2015NewLineleft join (select distinct database_id, object_id from sys.dm_db_missing_index_details) as mid on mid.database_id = d.database_id and mid.object_id = d.object_idDi2015NewLine

8861812Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Stack<SomePixelType> GetPolygonEdges(SomePixelType justSetPixel)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    visitedPixels.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if(!justSetPixel.IsPossiblePolygon)Di2015NewLine        return null; // Not a possible edge. No closed polygon could of been completed.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    visitedPixels.Push(justSetPixel);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SomePixelType currentPixel = justSetPixel;Di2015NewLine    while(visitedPixels.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        currentPixel  = currentPixel.GetNextPixel();Di2015NewLine        if(currentPixel == null) // No possible neighbouring polygon edges.Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            currentPixel = visitedPixels.Pop(); // BacktrackDi2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if(currentPixel == justSetPixel)Di2015NewLine            return visitedPixels;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        visitedPixels.Push(currentPixel);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return null; // Not closed.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
