8865255Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class RoomDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Number { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int BottleCount { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Room(int wNumber)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Number = wNumber;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8865255Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const int MAX_ROOMS = 4;Di2015NewLine        var cRooms = new System.Collections.Generic.List<Room>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int nI = 0; nI < MAX_ROOMS; nI++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // The room number is 1 to 4Di2015NewLine            cRooms.Add(new Room(nI + 1));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Initializes the room that winsDi2015NewLine        //Start of while loop to ask what room your adding into. Di2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.Write("Enter the room you're in: ");Di2015NewLine            //If user enters quit at anytime, the code will jump out of while statement and enter for loop belowDi2015NewLine            string roomNumber = Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            if (roomNumber == "quit")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Break statement allows quit to jump out of loopDi2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            int room = 0;Di2015NewLine            if (int.TryParse(roomNumber, out room) && (room < MAX_ROOMS) && (room >= 0)) {Di2015NewLine                Room currentRoom;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                currentRoom = cRooms[room];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.Write("Bottles collected in room {0}: ", currentRoom.Number);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int wBottleCount = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (int.TryParse(Console.ReadLine(), out wBottleCount) && (wBottleCount >= 0))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // This line adds the count of bottles and records it so you can continuously count the bottles collected.Di2015NewLine                    currentRoom.BottleCount += wBottleCount;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Invalid bottle count; value must be greater than 0");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Invalid room number; value must be between 1 and " + MAX_ROOMS.ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Room maxRoom = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Room currentRoom in cRooms) //This loop goes through the array of rooms (4)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // This assumes that the bottle count can never be decreased in a roomDi2015NewLine            if ((maxRoom == null) || (maxRoom.BottleCount < currentRoom.BottleCount))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                maxRoom = currentRoom;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Bottles collected in room {0} = {1}", currentRoom.Number, currentRoom.BottleCount);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //Outputs winnerDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("And the Winner is room " + maxRoom.Number + "!!!");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8866286Di2015UniqueSeparatorLinkbutton btn;Di2015NewLinebtn.Attributes.Add("onClick", "OnClick();");Di2015NewLine
8866286Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar clickCount = 0;Di2015NewLinevar timeoutID  = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefunction OnClick()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    clickCount++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (clickCount >= 2) {Di2015NewLine       clickCount = 0;          //reset clickCountDi2015NewLine       clearTimeout(timeoutID); //stop the single click callback from being calledDi2015NewLine       DoubleClickFunction();   //perform your double click actionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (clickCount == 1) {Di2015NewLine       //create a callback that will be called in a few milisecondsDi2015NewLine       //the callback time determines how long the user has to click a second timeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       var callBack = function(){ Di2015NewLine                         //make sure this wasn't fired atDi2015NewLine                         //the same time they double clickedDi2015NewLine                         if (clickCount == 1) {      Di2015NewLine                            clickCount = 0;         //reset the clickCountDi2015NewLine                            SingleClickFunction();  //perform your single click actionDi2015NewLine                         }Di2015NewLine                      };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       //This will call the callBack function in 500 milliseconds (1/2 second).Di2015NewLine       //If by that time they haven't clicked the LinkButton againDi2015NewLine       //We will perform the single click action. You can adjust theDi2015NewLine       //Time here to control how quickly the user has to double click.Di2015NewLine       timeoutID = setTimeout(callBack, 500); Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8866370Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic override void WriteString(string text)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The start index of the next substring containing only non-entitized characters.Di2015NewLine    int start = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The index of the current character being checked.Di2015NewLine    for (int curr = 0; curr < text.Length; ++curr)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Check whether the current character should be entitized.Di2015NewLine        char chr = text[curr];Di2015NewLine        if (chr == '\\r' || chr == '\\n' || chr == '\\t')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Write the previous substring of non-entitized characters.Di2015NewLine            if (start < curr)Di2015NewLine                base.WriteString(text.Substring(start, curr - start));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Write current character, entitized.Di2015NewLine            base.WriteCharEntity(chr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Next substring of non-entitized characters tentatively startsDi2015NewLine            // immediately beyond current character.Di2015NewLine            start = curr + 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Write the trailing substring of non-entitized characters.Di2015NewLine    if (start < text.Length)Di2015NewLine        base.WriteString(text.Substring(start, text.Length - start));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8867250Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class RoomDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Number { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int BottleCount { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Room(int wNumber)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Number = wNumber;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8867250Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const int MAX_ROOMS = 4;Di2015NewLine        var cRooms = new System.Collections.Generic.List<Room>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int nI = 0; nI < MAX_ROOMS; nI++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // The room number is 1 to 4Di2015NewLine            cRooms.Add(new Room(nI + 1));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Initializes the room that winsDi2015NewLine        //Start of while loop to ask what room your adding into. Di2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.Write("Enter the room you're in: ");Di2015NewLine            //If user enters quit at anytime, the code will jump out of while statement and enter for loop belowDi2015NewLine            string roomNumber = Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            if (roomNumber == "quit")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Break statement allows quit to jump out of loopDi2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            int room = 0;Di2015NewLine            if (int.TryParse(roomNumber, out room) && (room < MAX_ROOMS) && (room >= 0)) {Di2015NewLine                Room currentRoom;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                currentRoom = cRooms[room];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.Write("Bottles collected in room {0}: ", currentRoom.Number);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int wBottleCount = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (int.TryParse(Console.ReadLine(), out wBottleCount) && (wBottleCount >= 0))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // This line adds the count of bottles and records it so you can continuously count the bottles collected.Di2015NewLine                    currentRoom.BottleCount += wBottleCount;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Invalid bottle count; value must be greater than 0");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Invalid room number; value must be between 1 and " + MAX_ROOMS.ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Room maxRoom = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Room currentRoom in cRooms) //This loop goes through the array of rooms (4)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // This assumes that the bottle count can never be decreased in a roomDi2015NewLine            if ((maxRoom == null) || (maxRoom.BottleCount < currentRoom.BottleCount))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                maxRoom = currentRoom;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Bottles collected in room {0} = {1}", currentRoom.Number, currentRoom.BottleCount);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //Outputs winnerDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("And the Winner is room " + maxRoom.Number + "!!!");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8868471Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyElementCollection : ConfigurationElementCollectionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const string ELEMENT1 = "Element1";Di2015NewLine    const string ELEMENT2 = "Element2";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override ConfigurationElement CreateNewElement ()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new MyElement (this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override object GetElementKey (ConfigurationElement element)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ((MyElement)element).Key;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This method called when framework sees unknown element tagDi2015NewLine    // inside the collection. You can choose to handle it yourselfDi2015NewLine    // and return true, or return false to invoke default actionDi2015NewLine    // (exception will be thrown).Di2015NewLine    protected override bool OnDeserializeUnrecognizedElement (string elementName, XmlReader reader)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (elementName == ELEMENT1 || elementName == ELEMENT2 {Di2015NewLine            var myElement = new MyElement (this);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            switch (elementName) {Di2015NewLine            case ELEMENT1:Di2015NewLine                myElement.Type = MyElementType.Element1;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case ELEMENT2:Di2015NewLine                myElement.Type = MyElementType.Element2;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            myElement.DeserializeElementForConfig (reader, false);Di2015NewLine            BaseAdd (myElement);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8868471Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic enum MyElementTypeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Element1,Di2015NewLine    Element2,Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MyElement : ConfigurationElementDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const string NAME = "name";Di2015NewLine    const string VALUE = "value";Di2015NewLine    const string FORMAT = "format";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // keys should be unique, current collection count will doDi2015NewLine    // the trick without introducing artificial keysDi2015NewLine    public MyElement (ConfigurationElementCollection collection)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Key = collection.Count;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // note that this is not ConfigurationPropertyDi2015NewLine    public int Key { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // note that this is not ConfigurationPropertyDi2015NewLine    public MyElementType Type { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [ConfigurationProperty(NAME)]Di2015NewLine    public string Name {Di2015NewLine        get { return (string)this [NAME]; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [ConfigurationProperty(VALUE)]Di2015NewLine    public string Value {Di2015NewLine        get { return (string)this [VALUE]; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [ConfigurationProperty(FORMAT)]Di2015NewLine    public string Format {Di2015NewLine        get { return (string)this [FORMAT]; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This is called when framework needs a copy of the element,Di2015NewLine    // but it knows only about properties tagged with ConfigurationProperty.Di2015NewLine    // We override this to copy our Key and Type, otherwise they willDi2015NewLine    // have default values.Di2015NewLine    protected override void Reset (ConfigurationElement parentElement)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.Reset (parentElement);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var myElement = (MyElement)parentElement;Di2015NewLine        Key = myElement.Key;Di2015NewLine        Type = myElement.Type;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // original ConfigurationElement have this protected,Di2015NewLine    // redeclaring as protected internal to call it from collection classDi2015NewLine    protected internal void DeserializeElementForConfig (XmlReader reader, bool serializeCollectionKey)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DeserializeElement (reader, serializeCollectionKey);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8869774Di2015UniqueSeparatorInclude
8869774Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar newRolsIds = new List<int> { 1, 2, 5 };Di2015NewLineusing (var context = new MyObjectContext())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var user = context.Users.Include("Roles")Di2015NewLine        .Single(u => u.UserId == 3);Di2015NewLine    // loads user with roles, for example role 3 and 5Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var newRoles = context.RolesDi2015NewLine        .Where(r => newRolsIds.Contains(r.RoleId))Di2015NewLine        .ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    user.Roles.Clear();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var newRole in newRoles)Di2015NewLine        user.Roles.Add(newRole);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    context.SaveChanges();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8869774Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar newRolsIds = new List<int> { 1, 2, 5 };Di2015NewLineusing (var context = new MyObjectContext())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var user = context.Users.Include("Roles")Di2015NewLine        .Single(u => u.UserId == 3);Di2015NewLine    // loads user with roles, for example role 3 and 5Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var role in user.Roles.ToList())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Remove the roles which are not in the list of new rolesDi2015NewLine        if (!newRoleIds.Contains(role.RoleId))Di2015NewLine            user.Roles.Remove(role);Di2015NewLine        // Removes role 3 in the exampleDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var newRoleId in newRoleIds)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Add the roles which are not in the list of user's rolesDi2015NewLine        if (!user.Roles.Any(r => r.RoleId == newRoleId))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var newRole = new Role { RoleId = newRoleId };Di2015NewLine            context.Roles.Attach(newRole);Di2015NewLine            user.Roles.Add(newRole);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Adds roles 1 and 2 in the exampleDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // The roles which the user was already in (role 5 in the example)Di2015NewLine    // have neither been removed nor added.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    context.SaveChanges();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8873052Di2015UniqueSeparator    public Form1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        pictureBox1.Paint += new PaintEventHandler(pictureBox1_Paint);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Center = new PointF((float)pBox1.Width / 2, (float)pBox1.Height / 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MillisecondLength = (float)pBox1.Width / 4;  //length of millisecond handDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        timer1.Interval = 10;  Di2015NewLine        timer1.Enabled = true;Di2015NewLine        timer1.Tick += new EventHandler(timer1_Tick);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    PointF Center;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    float MillisecondLength;Di2015NewLine    Pen MillisecondsPen = new Pen(Brushes.Blue, (float)3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    double HALF_PI = Math.PI / 2;Di2015NewLine    double TWO_PI = 2 * Math.PI;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    double millisecondHandAngle(DateTime dt)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //12 o'clock is at the top! (- PI / 2)Di2015NewLine        return TWO_PI * dt.Millisecond / 1000 - HALF_PI;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void pBox1_Paint(object sender, PaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DateTime dt = DateTime.Now;         Di2015NewLine        double mangle = millisecondHandAngle(dt);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SizeF millisecondOffset = new SizeF(Di2015NewLine            (float)(MillisecondLength * Math.Cos(mangle)), Di2015NewLine            (float)(MillisecondLength * Math.Sin(mangle))Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PointF endMillisecond = PointF.Add(Center, millisecondOffset);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        e.Graphics.DrawLine(MillisecondsPen, Center, endMillisecond);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void timer1_Tick(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        pBox1.Invalidate();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8875545Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Cryptography;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class SecureItDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly byte[] entropy = Encoding.Unicode.GetBytes("Salt Is Not A Password");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string EncryptString(this SecureString input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (input == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var encryptedData = ProtectedData.Protect(Di2015NewLine            Encoding.Unicode.GetBytes(input.ToInsecureString()),Di2015NewLine            entropy,Di2015NewLine            DataProtectionScope.CurrentUser);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Convert.ToBase64String(encryptedData);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static SecureString DecryptString(this string encryptedData)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (encryptedData == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var decryptedData = ProtectedData.Unprotect(Di2015NewLine                Convert.FromBase64String(encryptedData),Di2015NewLine                entropy,Di2015NewLine                DataProtectionScope.CurrentUser);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return Encoding.Unicode.GetString(decryptedData).ToSecureString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new SecureString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static SecureString ToSecureString(this IEnumerable<char> input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (input == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var secure = new SecureString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var c in input)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            secure.AppendChar(c);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        secure.MakeReadOnly();Di2015NewLine        return secure;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string ToInsecureString(this SecureString input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine Marshal.SecureStringToBSTR(input);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Marshal.PtrToStringBSTR(ptr);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine 8877076Di2015UniqueSeparatorJsonIgnoreAttribute
8877076Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass InterfaceContractResolver : DefaultContractResolverDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public InterfaceContractResolver() : this(false) { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public InterfaceContractResolver(bool shareCache) : base(shareCache) { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override JsonProperty CreateProperty(MemberInfo member, MemberSerialization memberSerialization)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var property = base.CreateProperty(member, memberSerialization);Di2015NewLine        var interfaces = member.DeclaringType.GetInterfaces();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var @interface in interfaces)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var interfaceProperty in @interface.GetProperties())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // This is weak: among other things, an implementation Di2015NewLine                // may be deliberately hiding an interface memberDi2015NewLine                if (interfaceProperty.Name == member.Name && interfaceProperty.MemberType == member.MemberType)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (interfaceProperty.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(JsonIgnoreAttribute), true).Any())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        property.Ignored = true;Di2015NewLine                        return property;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (interfaceProperty.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(JsonPropertyAttribute), true).Any())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        property.Ignored = false;Di2015NewLine                        return property;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return property;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8881242Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    XmlFeedItemPath xfip;Di2015NewLine    NameValueCollection appSettings = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings;Di2015NewLine    List<string> xmlFeeds = appSettings.AllKeys.Where(x => x.StartsWith("XmlFeed")).ToList();Di2015NewLine    string currentXmlFeedType;Di2015NewLine    if(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(xmlFeedType))Di2015NewLine        xmlFeeds.RemoveAll(s => !appSettings[s].Contains(XmlFeedType));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    xmlFeeds.ForEach(x =>Di2015NewLine    {   Di2015NewLine        currentXmlFeedType = XmlHelper.GetXmlFeedType(appSettings[x]);Di2015NewLine        xfip = XmlHelper.GetXmlFeedItemPath(currentXmlFeedType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var request = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(Server.UrlDecode(XmlHelper.GetXmlFeedUrl(appSettings[x])));Di2015NewLine        request.Method = "GET";Di2015NewLine        request.UserAgent = "Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 8.0; Windows NT 6.0)";Di2015NewLine        XPathNavigator xpn = new XPathDocument(XmlReader.Create(request.GetResponse().GetResponseStream())).CreateNavigator();Di2015NewLine        XmlNamespaceManager xmlnsm = XmlHelper.GetXmlNameSpaceManager(xpn);Di2015NewLine        XPathNodeIterator nodes = xpn.Select(xfip.IteratorPath, xmlnsm);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int i = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (XPathNavigator node in nodes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string publishDate = string.IsNullOrEmpty(xfip.PublishDatePath) ? null : node.SelectSingleNode(xfip.PublishDatePath, xmlnsm).ToString();Di2015NewLine            XmlFeedItems.Add(new XmlFeedItem()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Title = string.IsNullOrEmpty(xfip.TitlePath) ? xfip.DefaultTitle : node.SelectSingleNode(xfip.TitlePath, xmlnsm).ToString(),Di2015NewLine                Link = string.IsNullOrEmpty(xfip.LinkPath) ? null : node.SelectSingleNode(xfip.LinkPath, xmlnsm).ToString(),Di2015NewLine                Teaser = string.IsNullOrEmpty(xfip.TeaserPath) ? null : XmlHelper.WrapUrlWithAnchorTags(HttpUtility.HtmlDecode(node.SelectSingleNode(xfip.TeaserPath, xmlnsm).ToString())),Di2015NewLine                Source = string.IsNullOrEmpty(xfip.SourcePath) ? null : xpn.SelectSingleNode(xfip.SourcePath, xmlnsm).ToString(),Di2015NewLine                SortOrder = i,Di2015NewLine                XmlFeedType = currentXmlFeedType,Di2015NewLine                PublishDate = string.IsNullOrEmpty(publishDate) ? new DateTime() : DateTime.Parse(publishDate.Remove(publishDate.IndexOf(" +")))Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine            i++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    rptRssFeed.DataSource = XmlFeedItems.OrderBy(x => x.GetType().GetProperty(sortField)).Take(10);Di2015NewLine    rptRssFeed.DataBind();Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

8881592Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate ManualResetEvent waitHandle;Di2015NewLineprivate object syncRoot = new object();Di2015NewLineprivate bool isRunning = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid CreateThread()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    this.waitHandle = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    isRunning = true; // Set to false to kill the threadDi2015NewLine    System.Threading.Thread t = new Thread(new ThreadStart(QueueCometWaitRequest_WaitCallback));         Di2015NewLine    t.IsBackground = false; Di2015NewLine    t.Start();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid PushData()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // On incoming data, push data into the processRequest queue and set the waithandleDi2015NewLine    lock(syncRoot)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        processRequest.Add(/* ... your data object to process. Assumes this is a queue */);Di2015NewLine        waitHandle.Set(); // Signal to the thread there is data to processDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid QueueCometWaitRequest_WaitCallback() Di2015NewLine{    Di2015NewLine    while (isRunning)    Di2015NewLine    {       Di2015NewLine        // Waits here using 0% CPU until the waitHandle.Set is called aboveDi2015NewLine        this.waitHandle.WaitOne();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Ensures no-one sets waithandle while data is being processed andDi2015NewLine        // subsequently resetDi2015NewLine        lock(syncRoot)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < processRequest.Length; i++)           Di2015NewLine            {                        Di2015NewLine                // Process the message. Di2015NewLine                // What's the type of processRequest? Im assuming a queue or something     Di2015NewLine            }       Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Reset the Waithandle for the next requestto processDi2015NewLine            this.waitHandle.Reset();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }        Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

8882278Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IHaveAAndBDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool A { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    bool B { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Foo : IHaveAAndBDi2015NewLine{     Di2015NewLine    public bool A { get; set; }     Di2015NewLine    public bool B { get; set; }     Di2015NewLine    public bool C { get; set; }     Di2015NewLine    public bool D { get; set; }     Di2015NewLine    public bool E { get; set; } Di2015NewLine}  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Bar : IHaveAAndBDi2015NewLine{     Di2015NewLine    public bool A { get; set; }     Di2015NewLine    public bool B { get; set; } Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Disclaimer - I've not tested whether this compiles but essentiallyDi2015NewLine// make the method generic and call it using the interface typeDi2015NewLine// and you can then do a copy from one set of properties to the otherDi2015NewLine// e.g. CopyInterfaceProperties<IHaveAAndB>(new Foo(), new Bar());Di2015NewLinepublic static void CopyInterfaceProperties<T>(T e1, T e2)     Di2015NewLine{         Di2015NewLine    foreach (var prop in typeof(T).GetProperties())         Di2015NewLine    {          Di2015NewLine        if (prop.CanRead && prop.CanWrite)  Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var value = prop.GetValue(e2, null)Di2015NewLine            prop.SetValue(e1, value, null);   Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }     Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

8883203Di2015UniqueSeparator// Finds ones with absolutely no overlapDi2015NewLinevar unmodified = shifts.Where(s => !exceptions.Any(e => s.Start < e.End && s.End > e.Start));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Finds ones entirely overlappedDi2015NewLinevar overlapped = shifts.Where(s => exceptions.Any(e => e.End >= s.End && e.Start <= s.Start));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Adjusted shiftsDi2015NewLinevar adjusted = shifts.Where(s => !unmodified.Contains(s) && !overlapped.Contains(s))Di2015NewLine                        .Select(s => new ShiftDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            Start = exceptions.Where(e => e.Start <= s.Start && e.End > s.Start).Any() ? exceptions.Where(e => e.Start <= s.Start && e.End > s.Start).First().End : s.Start,Di2015NewLine                            End = exceptions.Where(e => e.Start < s.End && e.End >= s.End).Any() ? exceptions.Where(e => e.Start < s.End && e.End >= s.End).First().Start : s.EndDi2015NewLine                        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar newShiftSet = unmodified.Union(overlapped).Union(adjusted);Di2015NewLine

8885228Di2015UniqueSeparatorSendString
8885228Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Synthesizes keystrokes corresponding to the specified Unicode string,Di2015NewLine/// sending them to the currently active window.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="s">The string to send.</param>Di2015NewLinepublic static void SendString(string s)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Construct list of inputs in order to send them through a single SendInput call at the end.Di2015NewLine    List<INPUT> inputs = new List<INPUT>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Loop through each Unicode character in the string.Di2015NewLine    foreach (char c in s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // First send a key down, then a key up.Di2015NewLine        foreach (bool keyUp in new bool[] { false, true })Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // INPUT is a multi-purpose structure which can be used Di2015NewLine            // for synthesizing keystrokes, mouse motions, and button clicks.Di2015NewLine            INPUT input = new INPUTDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Need a keyboard event.Di2015NewLine                type = INPUT_KEYBOARD,Di2015NewLine                u = new InputUnionDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // KEYBDINPUT will contain all the information for a single keyboard eventDi2015NewLine                    // (more precisely, for a single key-down or key-up).Di2015NewLine                    ki = new KEYBDINPUTDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Virtual-key code must be 0 since we are sending Unicode characters.Di2015NewLine                        wVk = 0,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // The Unicode character to be sent.Di2015NewLine                        wScan = c,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // Indicate that we are sending a Unicode character.Di2015NewLine                        // Also indicate key-up on the second iteration.Di2015NewLine                        dwFlags = KEYEVENTF_UNICODE | (keyUp ? KEYEVENTF_KEYUP : 0),Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        dwExtraInfo = GetMessageExtraInfo(),Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Add to the list (to be sent later).Di2015NewLine            inputs.Add(input);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Send all inputs together using a Windows API call.Di2015NewLine    SendInput((uint)inputs.Count, inputs.ToArray(), Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(INPUT)));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineconst int INPUT_MOUSE = 0;Di2015NewLineconst int INPUT_KEYBOARD = 1;Di2015NewLineconst int INPUT_HARDWARE = 2;Di2015NewLineconst uint KEYEVENTF_EXTENDEDKEY = 0x0001;Di2015NewLineconst uint KEYEVENTF_KEYUP = 0x0002;Di2015NewLineconst uint KEYEVENTF_UNICODE = 0x0004;Di2015NewLineconst uint KEYEVENTF_SCANCODE = 0x0008;Di2015NewLineconst uint XBUTTON1 = 0x0001;Di2015NewLineconst uint XBUTTON2 = 0x0002;Di2015NewLineconst uint MOUSEEVENTF_MOVE = 0x0001;Di2015NewLineconst uint MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN = 0x0002;Di2015NewLineconst uint MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP = 0x0004;Di2015NewLineconst uint MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTDOWN = 0x0008;Di2015NewLineconst uint MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTUP = 0x0010;Di2015NewLineconst uint MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEDOWN = 0x0020;Di2015NewLineconst uint MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEUP = 0x0040;Di2015NewLineconst uint MOUSEEVENTF_XDOWN = 0x0080;Di2015NewLineconst uint MOUSEEVENTF_XUP = 0x0100;Di2015NewLineconst uint MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL = 0x0800;Di2015NewLineconst uint MOUSEEVENTF_VIRTUALDESK = 0x4000;Di2015NewLineconst uint MOUSEEVENTF_ABSOLUTE = 0x8000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestruct INPUTDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int type;Di2015NewLine    public InputUnion u;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[StructLayout(LayoutKind.Explicit)]Di2015NewLinestruct InputUnionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [FieldOffset(0)]Di2015NewLine    public MOUSEINPUT mi;Di2015NewLine    [FieldOffset(0)]Di2015NewLine    public KEYBDINPUT ki;Di2015NewLine    [FieldOffset(0)]Di2015NewLine    public HARDWAREINPUT hi;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLinestruct MOUSEINPUTDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int dx;Di2015NewLine    public int dy;Di2015NewLine    public uint mouseData;Di2015NewLine    public uint dwFlags;Di2015NewLine    public uint time;Di2015NewLine    public IntPtr dwExtraInfo;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLinestruct KEYBDINPUTDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /*Virtual Key code.  Must be from 1-254.  If the dwFlags member specifies KEYEVENTF_UNICODE, wVk must be 0.*/Di2015NewLine    public ushort wVk;Di2015NewLine    /*A hardware scan code for the key. If dwFlags specifies KEYEVENTF_UNICODE, wScan specifies a Unicode character which is to be sent to the foreground application.*/Di2015NewLine    public ushort wScan;Di2015NewLine    /*Specifies various aspects of a keystroke.  See the KEYEVENTF_ constants for more information.*/Di2015NewLine    public uint dwFlags;Di2015NewLine    /*The time stamp for the event, in milliseconds. If this parameter is zero, the system will provide its own time stamp.*/Di2015NewLine    public uint time;Di2015NewLine    /*An additional value associated with the keystroke. Use the GetMessageExtraInfo function to obtain this information.*/Di2015NewLine    public IntPtr dwExtraInfo;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLinestruct HARDWAREINPUTDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public uint uMsg;Di2015NewLine    public ushort wParamL;Di2015NewLine    public ushort wParamH;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLinestatic extern IntPtr GetMessageExtraInfo();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[DllImport("user32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLinestatic extern uint SendInput(uint nInputs, INPUT[] pInputs, int cbSize);Di2015NewLine

8886171Di2015UniqueSeparator  public class BaseXDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly string _digits;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public BaseX(string digits)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _digits = digits;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public string ToBaseX(int number)Di2015NewLine        {           Di2015NewLine            var output = "";Di2015NewLine            doDi2015NewLine            {                Di2015NewLine                output = _digits[number % _digits.Length] + output;Di2015NewLine                number = number / _digits.Length;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            while (number > 0);Di2015NewLine            return output;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int FromBaseX(string number)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return number.Aggregate(0, (a, c) => a*_digits.Length + _digits.IndexOf(c));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8891097Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static byte[] GetHash(string password, string salt)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] unhashedBytes = Encoding.Unicode.GetBytes(String.Concat(salt, password));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SHA256Managed sha256 = new SHA256Managed();Di2015NewLine        byte[] hashedBytes = sha256.ComputeHash(unhashedBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return hashedBytes;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool CompareHash(string attemptedPassword, byte[] hash, string salt)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string base64Hash = Convert.ToBase64String(hash);Di2015NewLine        string base64AttemptedHash = Convert.ToBase64String(GetHash(attemptedPassword, salt));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return base64Hash == base64AttemptedHash;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8897600Di2015UniqueSeparator[ServiceBehavior(InstanceContextMode = InstanceContextMode.Single, ConcurrencyMode = ConcurrencyMode.Reentrant)]Di2015NewLinepublic class MyService : IMyServiceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private List<IMyService_Callback> callbacks;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyService()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.callbacks = new List<IMyService_Callback>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void CallClients(string message)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        callbacks.ForEach(delegate(IMyService_Callback callback)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            callback.NotifyClients(message);Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Subscribe()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IMyService_Callback callback = OperationContext.Current.GetCallbackChannel<IMyService_Callback>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!this.callbacks.Contains(callback))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.callbacks.Add(callback);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // send a message back to the clientDi2015NewLine        CallClients("Added a new callback");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8897646Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the authorization header.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="method">The method.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="url">The URL of the request.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="parameters">The parameters.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Authorization header</returns>Di2015NewLine    public string GetAuthorizationHeader(string method, Uri url, NameValueCollection parameters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        parameters.Set("oauth_consumer_key", this.ConsumerKey);Di2015NewLine        parameters.Set("oauth_nonce", this.GetNonce());Di2015NewLine        parameters.Set("oauth_timestamp", this.GetTimeStamp());Di2015NewLine        parameters.Set("oauth_version", "1.0");Di2015NewLine        parameters.Set("oauth_signature_method", "HMAC-SHA1");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string signString = this.GetSignString(method, url, parameters);Di2015NewLine        string signature = this.GetSignature(signString, this.ConsumerSecret, this.tokenSecret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        parameters.Set("oauth_signature", signature);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder authorizationHeader = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        foreach (string paramKey in parameters.AllKeys)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (authorizationHeader.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                authorizationHeader.Append(", ");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                authorizationHeader.Append("OAuth ");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            authorizationHeader.AppendFormat("{0}=\\"{1}\\"", paramKey, OAuthHelper.UrlEncode(parameters[paramKey]));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return authorizationHeader.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8899367Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Settings : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string file = "my settings file";Di2015NewLine    XElement root;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Settings()Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        root = XElement.Load(file);           Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        root.Save(file);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Settings Read { get { return new Settings(); } } // return read-only versionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Write(Action<Settings> handler)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using(Setting settings = new Settings())Di2015NewLine            handler(settings);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // below here is implentation specificDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public XElement Root { get { return root; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string SettingA Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        get { return (string)(Root.Attribute("SettingA") ?? (object)string.Empty); }Di2015NewLine        set { Set(Root, "SettingsA", value, true); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // I wrote this for another StackOverflow threadDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Set any value via its .ToString() method.Di2015NewLine    /// <para>Returns XElement of source or the new XElement if is an ELEMENT</para>Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="isAttribute">true for ATTRIBUTE or false for ELEMENT</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>source or XElement value</returns>Di2015NewLine    private XElement Set(XElement source, string name, object value, bool isAttribute)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string sValue = value.ToString();Di2015NewLine        XElement eValue = source.Element(name), result = source;Di2015NewLine        XAttribute aValue = source.Attribute(name);Di2015NewLine        if (null != eValue)Di2015NewLine            eValue.ReplaceWith(result = new XElement(name, sValue));Di2015NewLine        else if (null != aValue)Di2015NewLine            aValue.ReplaceWith(new XAttribute(name, sValue));Di2015NewLine        else if (isAttribute)Di2015NewLine            source.Add(new XAttribute(name, sValue));Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            source.Add(result = new XElement(name, sValue));Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Replace with for XAttributeDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="source"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="value"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static XAttribute ReplaceWith(this XAttribute source, XAttribute value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        XElement parent = source.Parent;Di2015NewLine        if (null == parent)Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Source has no parent");Di2015NewLine        source.Remove();Di2015NewLine        parent.Add(value);Di2015NewLine        return value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8900998Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int PPwr_Count = 1; //number 1 is included by default.Di2015NewLine        int Top_Limit = 1000000000; //Can be any number up to 10^9Di2015NewLine        HashSet<int> hs = new HashSet<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int A = 2; A * A <= Top_Limit; ++A)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!hs.Contains(A))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //We use long because of possible overflowDi2015NewLine                long t = A*A;Di2015NewLine                while (t <= Top_Limit)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    hs.Add((int)t);Di2015NewLine                    t *= A;Di2015NewLine                    PPwr_Count++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(PPwr_Count);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
